original: saṃvatsaro vai yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ tasyaitaddvāraṃ yadamāvāsyā candramā eva
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ vai yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ tasya etat dvāram yat amāvāsyā candramāḥ eva

original: dvārapidhānaḥ 11.1.1.[2]
analyzed: dvāra pidhānaḥ

original: sa yo'māvāsyāyāmagnī ādhatte yathā vivṛtāyāṃ dvāri dvārā puram prapadyeta sa tata

analyzed: eva svargam lokam iyāt evam tat yat amāvāsyāyām ādhatte

analyzed: lokam āgacati tasmin iha vasati

analyzed: pṛṣṭhāni sarvāṇi candāṃsi

analyzed: yaḥ umāvāsyāyām ādhatte tasmāt amāvāsyāyām eva agnī ādadhīta

original: paurṇamāsyāmanvārabhetāmāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣeta 11.1.2.[1]

original: ghnanti vā etadyajñam yadenaṃ tanvate yannveva rājānamabhiṣuṇvani[ tattaṃ

analyzed: dṛṣad upalābhyām haviryajñam ghnanti

analyzed: sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: prajāyante sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: atha u api ekā atiriktā syāt sā prajāpatim abhyatiricyate sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: atha u api dve atirikte syātām dvandvam vai mithunam prajananam

analyzed: mithunam eva etat prajananam kriyate sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: tat tṛtīyam sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: atha u api catasraḥ utiriktāḥ syuḥ tat yathā ekā evam catasraḥ trayaḥ vai ime lokāḥ tat imān eva

analyzed: lokān tisṛbhiḥ āpnoti prajāpatiḥ vai ati imān lokān caturthaḥ tat prajāpatim eva

original: caturthyāpnoti saiṣā sampatsa yajñaḥ 11.1.2.[9]
analyzed: caturthyā āpnoti sā eṣā sampad sa yajñaḥ

original: sa yaddvābhyāmūnaṃ tadūnaṃ so'yajño yatpañcabhiratiriktaṃ tadatiriktaṃ so'yajñaḥ
analyzed: sa yat dvābhyām ūnam tat ūnam saḥ yajñaḥ yat pañcabhiḥ atiriktam tat atiriktam saḥ yajñaḥ

analyzed: trīṇi ca vai śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ ca saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ tat rātrīḥ āpnoti

original: nvanunirvāpyasyāthābhyuditasya 11.1.4.[1]

original: taddhaike dṛṣṭvopavasanti śvo nodetetyabhrasya vā hetoranirjñāya

original: yacaknuyāttaddadyānnādakṣiṇaṃ haviḥ syāditi hyāhuratha yadaiva
analyzed: yat caknuyāt tat dadyāt na adakṣiṇam haviḥ syāt iti hi āhuḥ atha yadā eva

original: nodiyādathopavaset 11.1.5.[1]

original: samṛdhyate 11.1.6.[21]
analyzed: samṛdhyate

original: ta iṣṭvā prācīṃ diśamapaśyan tām prācīmevākurvata seyam prācyeva
analyzed: te iṣṭvā prācīm diśam apaśyan tām prācīm eva akurvata sā iyam prācī eva

original: diktasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prācyaḥ sarpanti prācīṃ hyetāmakurvatopaināmitaḥ
analyzed: diś tasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ prācyaḥ sarpanti prācīm hi etām akurvata upa enām itas

original: kurvīmahīti tāmūrjamakurvatemāṃ khalūrjam paśyemeti sāsau dyaurabhavat 11.1.6.[22]
analyzed: kurvīmahi iti tām ūrjam akurvata imām khalu ūrjam paśyema iti sā asau dyauḥ abhavat

original: atha dakṣiṇāṃ diśamapaśyan tāṃ dakṣiṇāmevākurvata seyaṃ dakṣiṇaiva diktasmādu
analyzed: atha dakṣiṇām diśam apaśyan tām dakṣiṇām eva akurvata sā iyam dakṣiṇā eva diś tasmāt u

original: dakṣiṇata eva dakṣiṇā upatiṣṭhante dakṣiṇato'bhyavājanti dakṣiṇāṃ
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas eva dakṣiṇāḥ upatiṣṭhante dakṣiṇatas abhyavājanti dakṣiṇām

original: hyetāmakurvatopaināmitaḥ kurvīmahīti taṃ lokamakurvatemaṃ khalu lokam
analyzed: hi etām akurvata upa enām itas kurvīmahi iti tam lokam akurvata imam khalu lokam

original: paśyemeti tadidamantarikṣamabhavadeṣa vai lokaḥ sā yathā haiveyam
analyzed: paśyema iti tat idam antarikṣam abhavat eṣa vai lokaḥ sā yathā ha eva iyam

original: pratiṣṭhāvirasmiṃloke pṛthivyevamu haivaiṣā pratiṣṭhāviramuṣmiṃloka
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā āvis asmin loke pṛthivī evam u ha eva eṣā pratiṣṭhā āvis amuṣmin loke

original: idamantarikṣaṃ sa yadiha sannamuṃ lokaṃ na paśyati tasmādāhuḥ paro'kṣamasau
analyzed: idam antarikṣam sa yat iha san amum lokam na paśyati tasmāt āhuḥ parokṣam asau
lokaḥ iti

original: atha pratīcīṃ diśamapaśyan tāmāśāmakurvata tasmādyatprāṅ sṛtvā vindata etāmeva
analyzed: atha pratīcīm diśam apaśyan tām āśām akurvata tasmāt yat prāṅ sṛtvā vindate etām eva

original: tena diśametyāśāṃ hyetāmakurvatopaināmitaḥ kurvīmahīti tāṃ śriyamakurvatemāṃ
analyzed: tena diśam eti āśām hi etām akurvata upa enām itas kurvīmahi iti tām śriyam akurvata imām

original: khalu śriyam paśyemeti seyam pṛthivyabhavacrīrvā iyaṃ tasmādyo'syai bhūyiṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: khalu śriyam paśyema iti sā iyam pṛthivī abhavat rīḥ vai iyam tasmāt yaḥ usyai bhūyiṣṭham

original: vindate sa eva śreṣṭho bhavati 11.1.6.[24]
analyzed: vindate saḥ eva śreṣṭhaḥ bhavati

original: athodīcīṃ diśamapaśyan tāmapo'kurvatopaināmitaḥ kurvīmahīti taṃ
analyzed: atha udīcīm diśam apaśyan tām apokurvata upa enām itas kurvīmahi iti tam

original: dharmamakurvata dharmo vā āpastasmādyademaṃ lokamāpa āgacanti sarvamevedaṃ
analyzed: dharmam akurvata dharmaḥ vai āpaḥ tasmāt yadā imam lokam āpaḥ āgacanti sarvam eva idam

original: yathādharmam bhavatyatha yadāvṛṣṭirbhavati balīyāneva tarhyabalīyasa ādatte
analyzed: yathādharmam bhavati atha yadā avṛṣṭiḥ bhavati balīyān eva tarhi a balīyasaḥ ādatte

original: dharmo hyāpaḥ 11.1.6.[25]
analyzed: dharmaḥ hi āpaḥ

original: tā vā etāḥ ekādaśa devatāḥ pañca prayājā dvāvājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛttrayo'nuyājā 11.1.6.[26]
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekādaśa devatāḥ pañca prayājāḥ dvau ājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛt trayaḥ anuyājā

original: tā ekādaśāhutayaḥ etābhirvā āhutibhirdevā ihāṃlokānajayannetā diśastatho evaiṣa
analyzed: tāḥ ekādaśa āhutayaḥ etābhiḥ vai āhutibhiḥ devāḥ iha āṃ lokān ajayan etāḥ diśaḥ tathā u eva eṣa

original: etābhirāhutibhirimāṃlokānjayatyetā diśaḥ 11.1.6.[27]
analyzed: etābhiḥ āhutibhiḥ imān lokān jayati etāḥ diśaḥ

original: catasro'vāntaradiśaḥ ta eva catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājā avāntaradiśo vai devāścaturbhiḥ
analyzed: catasraḥ uvāntaradiśaḥ te eva catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ avāntaradiśaḥ vai devāḥ caturbhiḥ

original: patnīsaṃyājairajayannavāntaradiśa u evaiṣa etairjayati 11.1.6.[28]
analyzed: patnīsaṃyājaiḥ ajayan ava antaradiśaḥ u eva eṣa etaiḥ jayati

original: atheḍā annādyamevaitayā devā ajayaṃstatho evaiṣa etayānnādyameva jayatyeṣā nu
analyzed: atha iḍāḥ annādyam eva etayā devāḥ ajayan tathā u eva eṣa etayā annādyam eva jayati eṣā nu

original: devatrā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sampat 11.1.6.[29]
analyzed: devatrā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sampad

original: athādhyātmam pañceme puruṣe prāṇā ṛte cakṣurbhyāṃ ta eva pañca prayājā
analyzed: atha adhyātmam pañca ime puruṣe prāṇāḥ ṛte cakṣurbhyām te eva pañca prayājā

original: cakṣuṣī ājyabhāgau 11.1.6.[30]
analyzed: cakṣuṣī ājyabhāgau

original: ayamevāvāṅ prāṇaḥ sviṣṭakṛt sa yattamabhyardha ivetarābhya āhutibhyo juhoti
analyzed: ayam eva avāṅ prāṇaḥ sviṣṭakṛt sa yat tam abhyardhe iva itarābhyaḥ āhutibhyaḥ juhoti

original: tasmādetasmātprāṇātsarve prāṇā bībhatsante'tha yatsviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ
analyzed: tasmāt etasmāt prāṇāt sarve prāṇāḥ bībhatsantetha yat sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣām

original: haviṣāmavadyati tasmādyatkiṃ cemānprāṇānāpadyata etameva tatsarvaṃ samavaiti 11.1.6.[31]
analyzed: haviṣām avadyati tasmāt yat kim ca imān prāṇān āpadyate etam eva tat sarvam samavaiti

original: trīṇi śiśnāni ta eva trayo'nuyājāḥ sa yo'yaṃ varṣiṣṭho'nuyājastadidaṃ
analyzed: trīṇi śiśnāni te eva trayaḥ anuyājāḥ sa yaḥ yam varṣiṣṭhaḥ anuyājaḥ tat idam

original: varṣiṣṭhamiva śiśnaṃ taṃ vā anavānanyajedityāhustatho hāsyaitadamṛdhram
analyzed: varṣiṣṭham iva śiśnam tam vai an avānan yajet iti āhuḥ tathā u ha asya etat amṛdhram

original: bhavatīti 11.1.6.[32]
analyzed: bhavati iti

original: sa vai sakṛdavānyāt ekaṃ hyetasya parvātha yadaparvakaṃ syātpratṛṇaṃ vaiva
analyzed: sa vai sakṛt avānyāt ekam hi etasya parva atha yat aparvakam syāt pratṛṇam vā eva

original: tiṣṭhellambeta vā tasmādetaducca tiṣṭati padyate ca tasmātsakṛdavānyāt 11.1.6.[33]
analyzed: tiṣṭhet lambeta vā tasmāt etat ucca tiṣṭati padyate ca tasmāt sakṛt avānyāt

original: dvau bāhū dvā ūrū ta eva catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ pratiṣṭhāyameva prāṇa iḍā yattāṃ
analyzed: dvau bāhū dvau ūrū te eva catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ pratiṣṭhā ayam eva prāṇaḥ iḍā yattām

original: nāgnau juhoti yatsāpradagdheva tasmādayamanavatṛṇaḥ prāṇaḥ 11.1.6.[34]
analyzed: na agnau juhoti yat sā a pradagdhā iva tasmāt ayam an avatṛṇaḥ prāṇaḥ

original: asthyeva yājyānuvākyāḥ māṃsaṃ havistanmitaṃ cando yadyājyānuvākyāstasmādu
analyzed: asthi eva yājyā anuvākyāḥ māṃsam haviḥ tad mitam candaḥ yat yājyā anuvākyāḥ tasmāt u

original: samāvantyevāsthīni medyataśca kṛśyataśca bhavantyatha yadbhūya iva ca havirgṛhṇāti
analyzed: samāvanti eva asthīni medyataḥ ca kṛśyataḥ ca bhavanti atha yat bhūyaḥ iva ca haviḥ gṛhṇāti

original: kanīya iva ca tasmādu māṃsānyeva medyato medyanti māṃsāni kṛśyataḥ kṛśyanti
analyzed: kanīyaḥ iva ca tasmāt u māṃsāni eva medyataḥ medyanti māṃsāni kṛśyataḥ kṛśyanti

original: tenaitena yajñena yāṃ kāmayate devatāṃ tāṃ yajati yasyai havirbhavati 11.1.6.[35]
analyzed: tena etena yajñena yām kāmayate devatām tām yajati yasyai haviḥ bhavati

original: tā vā etāḥ anapoddhāryā āhutayo bhavanti sa
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ an apoddhāryāḥ āhutayaḥ bhavanti sa

original: yaddhaitāsāmapoddharedyathaikamaṅgaṃ śṛṇīyātprāṇaṃ vā nirhaṇyādevaṃ
analyzed: yat ha etāsām apoddharet yathā ekam aṅgam śṛṇīyāt prāṇam vā nirhaṇyāt evam

original: tadanyānyeva havīṃṣyupa cāhriyante'pa ca hriyante 11.1.6.[36]
analyzed: tat anyāni eva havīṃṣi upa ca āhriyanta ipa ca hriyante

original: tā vā etāḥ ṣoḍaśāhutayo bhavanti ṣoḍaśakalo vai puruṣaḥ puruṣo

original: yajñastasmātṣoḍaśāhutayo bhavanti 11.1.7.[1]
analyzed: yajñaḥ tasmāt ṣoḍaśa āhutayaḥ bhavanti

original: tadvā ado vratopāyana udyate yadi nāśnāti pitṛdevatyo bhavati yadyu aśnāti
analyzed: tat vai adaḥ vrata upāyane udyate yadi na aśnāti pitṛ devatyaḥ bhavati yadi u aśnāti

original: devānatyaśnātīti tadāraṇyamaśnīyāditi tatra sthāpayanti 11.1.7.[2]
analyzed: devān atyaśnāti iti tadā āraṇyam aśnīyāt iti tatra sthāpayanti

analyzed: sa yadi grāmyāḥ oṣadhīḥ aśnāti puroḍāśasya medham aśnāti yadi āraṇyāḥ oṣadhīḥ aśnāti

original: barhiṣo medhamaśnāti yadi vānaspatyamaśnātīdhmasya medhamaśnāti yadi payaḥ

original: pibati sāṃnāyyasya cājyasya ca medhamaśnāti yadyapaḥ pibati praṇītānām
analyzed: pibati sāṃnāyyasya ca ājyasya ca medham aśnāti yadi apaḥ pibati praṇītānām

original: medhamaśnāti yadi nāśnāti pitṛdevatyo bhavati 11.1.7.[3]
analyzed: medham aśnāti yadi na aśnāti pitṛ devatyaḥ bhavati

original: tadāhuḥ kimayanamiti svayaṃ haivaite rātrī agnihotraṃ juhuyātsa yaddhutvā prāśnāti
analyzed: tat āhuḥ kim ayanam iti svayam ha eva ete rātrī agnihotram juhuyāt sa yat hutvā prāśnāti

analyzed: tena a pitṛ devatyaḥ bhavati āhutiḥ vai eṣā sa yat eva etām ātman āhutim juhoti tena u eteṣām

original: medhānāṃ nāśnāti 11.1.7.[4]
analyzed: medhānām na aśnāti

original: ete ha vai rātrī sarvā rātrayaḥ samavayanti yā āpūryamāṇapakṣasya rātrayastāḥ sarvāḥ
analyzed: ete ha vai rātrī sarvāḥ rātrayaḥ samavayanti yāḥ āpūryamāṇapakṣasya rātrayaḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ

original: hutam bhavati 11.1.8.[1]
analyzed: hutam bhavati

original: devāśca vā asurāśca ubhaye prājāpatyāḥ paspṛdhire tato'surā atimānenaiva kasminnu
analyzed: devāḥ ca vai asurāḥ ca ubhaye prājāpatyāḥ paspṛdhire tatas usurāḥ atimānena eva kasmin nu

original: vayaṃ juhuyāmeti sveṣvevāsyeṣu juhvataśceruste'timānenaiva
analyzed: vayam juhuyāma iti sveṣu eva āsyeṣu juhvataḥ ceruḥ tetimānena eva

original: parābabhūvustasmānnātimanyeta parābhavasya haitanmukhaṃ yadatimānaḥ 11.1.8.[2]
analyzed: parābabhūvuḥ tasmāt na atimanyeta parābhavasya ha etat mukham yat atimānaḥ

original: atha devāḥ anyo'nyasminneva juhvataścerustebhyaḥ prajāpatirātmānam pradadau
analyzed: atha devāḥ anyonyasmin eva juhvataḥ ceruḥ tebhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ ātmānam pradadau

original: yajño haiṣāmāsa yajño hi devānāmannaṃ 11.1.8.[3]
analyzed: yajñaḥ ha eṣām āsa yajñaḥ hi devānām annam

original: sa devebhya ātmānam pradāya athaitamātmanaḥ pratimāmasṛjata yadyajñaṃ
analyzed: sa devebhyaḥ ātmānam pradāya atha etam ātmanaḥ pratimām asṛjata yat yajñam

original: tasmādāhuḥ prajāpatiryajña ityātmano hyetam pratimāmasṛjata 11.1.8.[4]
analyzed: tasmāt āhuḥ prajāpatiḥ yajñaḥ iti ātmanaḥ hi etam pratimām asṛjata

original: sa etena yajñena devebhya ātmānaṃ nirakrīṇīta sa yadvratamupaiti yathaiva

original: tatprajāpatirdevebhya ātmānam prāyacadevamevaiṣa etaddevebhya ātmānam

original: prayacati tasmādu saṃyata evaitāṃ rātriṃ cicariṣedyathā haviṣā caredevaṃ havirhyeṣa
analyzed: prayacati tasmāt u saṃyataḥ eva etām rātrim cicariṣet yathā haviṣā caret evam haviḥ hi eṣa

original: devānām bhavati 11.1.8.[5]
analyzed: devānām bhavati

original: atha yadyajñaṃ tanute yajñenaivaitaddevebhya ātmānaṃ niṣkrīṇīte yathaiva
analyzed: atha yat yajñam tanute yajñena eva etat devebhyaḥ ātmānam niṣkrīṇīte yathā eva

original: tatprajāpatirnirakrīṇītaivamatha yaddhavirnirvapati haviṣaivaitadyajñaṃ niṣkrīṇāti

original: haviranuvākyayānuvākyāmavadānenāvadānaṃ yājyayā yājyāṃ vaṣaṭkāreṇa

original: vaṣaṭkāramāhutyā tasyāhutirevāniṣkrītā bhavati 11.1.8.[6]
analyzed: vaṣaṭkāram āhutyā tasya āhutiḥ eva a niṣkrītā bhavati

original: sa yathāgrapraśīrṇo vṛkṣaḥ evamasyaiṣa yajño bhavatyāhutimevānvāhāryeṇa
analyzed: sa yathā agra praśīrṇaḥ vṛkṣaḥ evam asya eṣa yajñaḥ bhavati āhutim eva anvāhāryeṇa

original: niṣkrīṇāti tadyadetaddhīnaṃ yajñasyānvāharati tasmādanvāhāryo nāmaivamu
analyzed: niṣkrīṇāti tat yat etat hīnam yajñasya anvāharati tasmāt anvāhāryaḥ nāma evam u

original: hāsyaiṣa sarva eva yajño niṣkrīto bhavatyeṣa ha vai yajamānasyāmuṣmiṃloka ātmā

original: bhavati yadyajña sa ha sarvatanūreva yajamāno'muṣmiṃloke sambhavati ya evaṃ
analyzed: bhavati yat yajña sa ha sarva tanūḥ eva yajamānaḥ amuṣmin loke sambhavati yaḥ evam

original: vidvānniṣkrītyā yajate 11.2.1.[1]
analyzed: vidvān niṣkrītyā yajate

original: trirha vai puruṣo jāyate etannveva mātuścādhi pituścāgre jāyate'tha yaṃ yajña
analyzed: tris ha vai puruṣaḥ jāyate etat nu eva mātuḥ ca adhi pituḥ ca agre yam yajña

original: upanamati sa yadyajate taddvitīyaṃ jāyate'tha yatra mriyate
analyzed: upanamati sa yat yajate tat dvitīyam jāyate itha yatra mriyate

original: yatrainamagnāvabhyādadhati sa yattataḥ sambhavati tattṛtīyaṃ jāyate tasmāttriḥ
analyzed: yatra enam agnau abhyādadhati sa yat tatas sambhavati tat tṛtīyam jāyate tasmāt tris

original: puruṣo jāyata ityāhuḥ 11.2.1.[2]
analyzed: puruṣaḥ jāyate iti āhuḥ

original: tā vā etāḥ ekādaśa sāmidhenīranvāha daśa vā ime puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśo
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekādaśa sāmidhenīḥ anvāha daśa vai ime puruṣe prāṇāḥ ātmā ekādaśaḥ

original: yasminnete prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitā etāvānvai puruṣastadenaṃ kṛtsnaṃ janayatyatha
analyzed: yasmin ete prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ etāvān vai puruṣaḥ tat enam kṛtsnam janayati atha

original: yadūrdhvaṃ sāmidhenībhyaḥ sā pratiṣṭhā tadenaṃ janayitvā pratiṣṭhāpayati 11.2.1.[3]
analyzed: yat ūrdhvam sāmidhenībhyaḥ sā pratiṣṭhā tat enam janayitvā pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: nava prasavasya vyāhṛtayaḥ navame puruṣe prāṇāstadenaṃ dvitīyaṃ
analyzed: nava prasavasya vyāhṛtayaḥ navame puruṣe prāṇāḥ tat enam dvitīyam

original: janayatyāśrāvaṇam pratyāśrāvaṇaṃ sā pratiṣṭhātha yadevādaḥ sṛṣṭau janmodyate
analyzed: janayati āśrāvaṇam pratyāśrāvaṇam sā pratiṣṭhā atha yat eva adaḥ sṛṣṭau janma udyate

original: tadenaṃ tṛtīyaṃ janayati patnīsaṃyājā eva tatra pratiṣṭhā 11.2.1.[4]
analyzed: tat enam tṛtīyam janayati patnīsaṃyājāḥ eva tatra pratiṣṭhā

original: trirhi vai puruṣo jāyate evamevainametadyajñāttrirjanayati tāsāmekādaśānāṃ triḥ
analyzed: tris hi vai puruṣaḥ jāyate evam eva enam etat yajñāt tris janayati tāsām ekādaśānām tris

original: prathamāmanvāha triruttamām 11.2.1.[5]
analyzed: prathamām anvāha tris uttamām

original: tāḥ pañcadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ dvāvāghārau pañca prayājā iḍā trayo'nuyājāḥ

analyzed: cakruḥ idam vai atyarīricata idam ūnam akarta iti

original: juhoti dve sāyamāhutī juhoti dve prātastāścatasra āhutyaścatuṣpādvā aśvastadasya
analyzed: juhoti dve sāyamāhutī juhoti dve prātar tāḥ catasraḥ āhutyaḥ catuṣpād vai aśvaḥ tat asya

original: pade-pada evāhutirhutā bhavati 11.2.5.[3]
analyzed: pade pade eva āhutiḥ hutā bhavati

original: tadāhuḥ vivṛtte'śvasyeṣṭiṃ nirvapatītyeṣa vai somo rājā devānāmannaṃ
analyzed: tat āhuḥ vivṛtta īśvasya iṣṭim nirvapati iti eṣa vai somaḥ rājā devānām annam

analyzed: yat candramāḥ sa yatra eṣaḥ etām rātrim na purastāt na paścāt dadṛśe tat imam

original: lokamāgacati so'smiṃloke vivartate 11.2.5.[4]
analyzed: lokam āgacati saḥ usmin loke vivartate

analyzed: sa yadā āmāvāsyena yajate vivṛtte eva asya etat iṣṭim nirvapati atha yat paurṇamāsena

analyzed: yajata aśvamedham eva etat ālabhate tam ālabhya devebhyaḥ prayacati saṃvatsare vā

original: itaramaśvamedhamālabhanta eṣa vai māsaḥ pariplavamānaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ karoti
analyzed: itaram aśvamedham ālabhante eṣa vai māsaḥ pariplavamānaḥ saṃvatsaram karoti

original: tadasya saṃvatsare saṃvatsara evāśvamedha ālabdho bhavati 11.2.5.[5]
analyzed: tat asya saṃvatsare saṃvatsare eva aśvamedhaḥ ālabdhaḥ bhavati

original: taṃ vā etam māsi-māsyevāśvamedhamālabhante sa yo haivaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ ca
analyzed: tam vai etam māsi māsi eva aśvamedham ālabhante sa yaḥ ha evam vidvān agnihotram ca

analyzed: juhoti darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām ca yajate māsi māsi ha eva asya aśvamedhena iṣṭam

original: bhavatyetadu hāsyāgnihotraṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsau cāśvamedhamabhisampadyete 11.2.6.[1]

original: śiro ha vā etadyajñasya yatpraṇītāḥ sa yatpraṇītāḥ praṇayati śira evaitadyajñasya
analyzed: śiraḥ ha vai etat yajñasya yat praṇītāḥ sa yat praṇītāḥ praṇayati śiraḥ eva etat yajñasya

original: saṃskaroti sa vidyācira eva ma etatsaṃskriyata iti 11.2.6.[2]
analyzed: saṃskaroti sa vidyā ciras eva me etat saṃskriyate iti

original: prāṇa evāsyedhmaḥ prāṇena hīdaṃ sarvamiddhaṃ yatprāṇabhṛnnimiṣadyadejati sa

original: vidyādahamevaiṣa idhma iti 11.2.6.[3]
analyzed: vidyāt aham eva eṣa idhmaḥ iti

analyzed: anūkam eva asya sāmidhenyaḥ tasmāt tāḥ brūyāt saṃtanvan iva menubrūhi iti saṃtatam iva

original: vidyānmanaścaiva me vākcāghārau sarasvāṃśca sarasvatī ceti 11.2.6.[4]
analyzed: vidyāt manaḥ ca eva me vāc ca āghārau sarasvān ca sarasvatī ca iti

analyzed: pañca prayājāḥ ime eva asya te śīrṣaṇyāḥ pañca prāṇāḥ mukham eva asya prathamaḥ

analyzed: prayājaḥ dakṣiṇā nāsikā dvitīyaḥ savyā nāsikā tṛtīyaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ caturthaḥ savyaḥ

original: karṇaḥ pañcamo'tha yaccaturthe prayāje samānayati tasmādidaṃ śrotramantarataḥ
analyzed: karṇaḥ pañcamā utha yat caturthe prayāje samānayati tasmāt idam śrotram antarataḥ

original: saṃtṛṇaṃ cakṣuṣī ājyabhāgau sa vidyāccakṣuṣī eva ma etāviti 11.2.6.[5]
analyzed: saṃtṛṇam cakṣuṣī ājyabhāgau sa vidyāt cakṣuṣī eva me etau iti

original: atha ya āgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ ayamevāsya sa dakṣiṇo'rdho hṛdayamevāsyopāṃśuyājaḥ
analyzed: atha yaḥ āgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ ayam eva asya sa dakṣiṇa ūrdhaḥ hṛdayam eva asya upāṃśuyājaḥ

original: sa yattenopāṃśu caranti tasmādidaṃ guheva hṛdayam 11.2.6.[6]
analyzed: sa yat tena upāṃśu caranti tasmāt idam guhā iva hṛdayam

original: atha yo'gnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ ayamevāsya sa uttaro'rdha aindraṃ vā

original: sāṃnāyyamantarāṃsamevāsya sviṣṭakṛdviṣam prāśitram 11.2.6.[7]
analyzed: sāṃnāyyam antarāṃsam eva asya sviṣṭakṛt viṣam prāśitram

original: sa yatprāśitramavadyati yathaiva tatprājāpaterāviddhaṃ
analyzed: sa yat prāśitram avadyati yathā eva tat prājāpateḥ āviddham

original: nirakṛntannevamevaitasyaitadyadveṣṭitaṃ yadgrathitaṃ yadvaruṇyaṃ tanniṣkṛntanti
analyzed: nirakṛntan evam eva etasya etat yat veṣṭitam yat grathitam yat varuṇyam tat niṣkṛntanti

original: sa vidyādyathaiva tatprajāpaterāviddhaṃ nirakṛntannevameva ma idaṃ yadveṣṭitaṃ
analyzed: sa vidyāt yathā eva tat prajāpateḥ āviddham nirakṛntan evam eva me idam yat veṣṭitam

original: yadgrathitaṃ yadvaruṇyaṃ tanniṣkṛntantīti 11.2.6.[8]
analyzed: yat grathitam yat varuṇyam tat niṣkṛntanti iti

original: udaramevāsyeḍā tadyathaivāda iḍāyāṃ samavadyantyevamevedaṃ
analyzed: udaram eva asya iḍā tat yathā eva adaḥ iḍāyām samavadyanti evam eva idam

original: viśvarūpamannamudare samavadhīyate 11.2.6.[9]
analyzed: viśva rūpam annam udare samavadhīyate

original: trayo'nuyājāḥ ima evāsya te'vāñcastrayaḥ prāṇā bāhū evāsya sūktavākaśca
analyzed: trayaḥ anuyājāḥ ime eva asya tevāñcaḥ trayaḥ prāṇāḥ bāhū eva asya sūktavākaḥ ca

original: śamyorvākaśca catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāścatasro vai pratiṣṭhā ūrū dvāvaṣṭhīvantau
analyzed: śamyorvākaḥ ca catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ catasraḥ vai pratiṣṭhāḥ ūrū dvau aṣṭhīvantau

original: dvau prādāvevāsya samiṣṭayajuḥ 11.2.6.[10]
analyzed: dvau prādau eva asya samiṣṭa yajuḥ

original: trayo'nuyājāḥ sūktavākaśca śamyorvākaścātha yadevādaḥ patnīsaṃyājeṣu
analyzed: trayaḥ anuyājāḥ sūktavākaḥ ca śamyorvākaḥ ca atha yat eva adaḥ patnīsaṃyājeṣu

original: sampragṛhṇāti samiṣṭayajuśca 11.2.6.[11]
analyzed: sampragṛhṇāti samiṣṭa yajuḥ ca

original: tā ekaviṃśatirāhutayaḥ dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya pañcartavastrayo
analyzed: tāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ āhutayaḥ dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya pañca ṛtavaḥ trayaḥ

analyzed: lokāḥ tat viṃśatiḥ eṣaḥ eva ekaviṃśaḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati sā eṣā gatiḥ eṣā pratiṣṭhā tat etām

original: gatimetām pratiṣṭhāṃ gacati 11.2.6.[12]
analyzed: gatim etām pratiṣṭhām gacati

original: taddha smaitadāruṇirāha ardhamāsaśo vā ahamamunādityena saloko bhavāmi

original: tāmahaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sampadaṃ vedeti 11.2.6.[13]
analyzed: tām aham darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sampadam veda iti

original: tadāhuḥ ātmayājī śreyā3ndevayājī3 ityātmayājīti ha brūyātsa ha vā ātmayājī yo

analyzed: veda idam menena aṅgam saṃskriyate idam menena aṅgam upadhīyate iti sa yathā ahiḥ tvacaḥ

original: nirmucyetaivamasmānmartyācarīrātpāpmano nirmucyate sa ṛṅmayo yajurmayaḥ
analyzed: nirmucyeta evam asmāt martyāḥ carīrāt pāpmanaḥ nirmucyate saḥ ṛk mayaḥ yajuḥ mayaḥ

analyzed: sāma mayaḥ āhuti mayaḥ svargam lokam abhisambhavati

original: atha ha sa devayājī yo veda devānevāhamidaṃ yaje devāntsaparyāmīti sa yathā
analyzed: atha ha sa deva yājī yaḥ veda devān eva aham idam yaje devān saparyāmi iti sa yathā

analyzed: śreyase pāpīyān balim haret vaiśyaḥ vā rājñe balim haret evam sa sa ha na tāvantam lokam

analyzed: jayati yāvāntam itaraḥ

analyzed: saṃvatsarasya iṣṭam bhavati atha u yat kim ca saṃvatsare kriyate sarvam ha eva asya

analyzed: tat āptam avaruddham abhijitam bhavati

analyzed: ṛtavaḥ ṛtvijaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai ṛtavaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti veda ante ha eva asya ṛtūnām iṣṭam bhavati atha u

original: yatkiṃ cartuṣu kriyate sarvaṃ haivāsya tadāptamavaruddhamabhijitam bhavati 11.2.7.[3]

original: bhavatyatho yatkiṃ ca māseṣu kriyate sarvaṃ haivāsya

original: tadāptamavaruddhamabhijitam bhavati 11.2.7.[4]

analyzed: ardha māsāḥ haviḥ pātrāṇi sa yaḥ ha vai ardha māsāḥ haviḥ pātrāṇi iti vedānte

analyzed: ha eva asya tat āptam avaruddham abhijitam bhavati

original: ahorātre pariveṣṭrī sa yo ha vā ahorātre pariveṣṭrī iti vedānte
analyzed: ahar rātre pariveṣṭrī sa yaḥ ha vai ahar rātre pariveṣṭrī iti vedānte

original: haivāsyāhorātrayoriṣṭam bhavatyatho yatkiṃ cāhorātrayoḥ kriyate sarvaṃ haivāsya

original: tadāptamavaruddhamabhijitam bhavati 11.2.7.[6]
analyzed: tat āptam avaruddham abhijitam bhavati

original: iyameva prathamā sāmidhenī agnirdvitīyā vāyustṛtīyāntarikṣaṃ caturthī
analyzed: iyam eva prathamā sāmidhenī agniḥ dvitīyā vāyuḥ tṛtīyā antarikṣam caturthī

analyzed: daśamī brahmā ekādaśī etāḥ hi vai idam sarvam samindhate etābhiḥ idam sarvam

original: samiddhaṃ tasmātsāmidhenyo nāma 11.2.7.[7]
analyzed: samiddham tasmāt sāmidhenyaḥ nāma

original: sa vai triḥ prathamāmanvāha sa yatprathamamanvāha prācīṃ tena diśaṃ jayati

original: trirvevottamāmanvāha sa yatprathamamanvāha pratīcīṃ tena diśaṃ jayati
analyzed: tris u eva uttamām anvāha sa yat prathamam anvāha pratīcīm tena diśam jayati

original: yaddvitīyamudīcīṃ tena diśaṃ jayati yattṛtīyamimāmeva tena pratiṣṭhāṃ

original: jayatyevamu hābhirimāṃlokānjayatyetā diśaḥ 11.2.7.[9]
analyzed: jayati evam u ha ābhiḥ imān lokān jayati etāḥ diśaḥ

original: ṛtameva pūrva āghāraḥ satyamuttaro'va ha vā ṛtasatye runddhe'tho yatkiṃ

original: cartasatyābhyāṃ jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[10]
analyzed: carta satyābhyām jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

analyzed: tviṣiḥ eva prathamaḥ prayājaḥ apacitiḥ dvitīyaḥ yaśaḥ tṛtīyaḥ brahmavarcasam

original: caturtho'nnādyam pañcamaḥ 11.2.7.[11]
analyzed: caturtha unnādyam pañcamaḥ

original: sa prathamam prayājamanumantrayeta tviṣimānbhūyāsamityapacitimānbhūyāsamiti

analyzed: dvitīyam yaśasvī bhūyāsam iti tṛtīyam brahmavarcasī bhūyāsam iti caturtham anna ādaḥ

analyzed: bhūyāsam iti pañcamam tviṣimān ha vai apacitimān yaśasvī brahmavarcasī anna ādaḥ

original: bhavati ya evametadveda 11.2.7.[12]
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ evam etat veda

original: etaddha sma vai tadvidvānāha śvetaketurāruṇeyaḥ kaṃ svidevāparīṣu
analyzed: etat ha sma vai tad vidvān āha śvetaketuḥ āruṇeyaḥ kam svid eva aparīṣu

original: mahānāgamivābhisaṃsāraṃ didṛkṣitāro ya evametatprayājānāṃ yaśo vediteti 11.2.7.[13]
analyzed: mahā nāgam iva abhisaṃsāram didṛkṣitāraḥ yaḥ evam etat prayājānām yaśaḥ veditā iti

original: bhūtameva pūrva ājyabhāgaḥ bhaviṣyaduttaro'va ha vai bhūtaṃ ca bhaviṣyacca
analyzed: bhūtam eva pūrvaḥ ājyabhāgaḥ bhaviṣyat uttaraḥ uva ha vai bhūtam ca bhaviṣyat ca

original: runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca bhūtena ca bhaviṣyatā ca jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[14]
analyzed: runddhethaḥ yat kim ca bhūtena ca bhaviṣyatā ca jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

original: brahmāgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ sa yo ha vai brahmāgneyaḥ puroḍāśa iti vedāva ha
analyzed: brahma āgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai brahma āgneyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ iti vedāva ha

original: brahma runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca brahmaṇā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[15]
analyzed: brahma runddhethaḥ yat kim ca brahmaṇā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

original: kṣatramupāṃśuyājaḥ sa yo ha vai kṣatramupāṃśuyāja iti vedāva ha kṣatraṃ
analyzed: kṣatram upāṃśuyājaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai kṣatram upāṃśuyājaḥ iti veda ava ha kṣatram

original: runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca kṣatreṇa jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati tadyadupāṃśuyājaṃ
analyzed: runddhethaḥ yat kim ca kṣatreṇa jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati tat yat upāṃśuyājam

original: kurvantyeke naike tasmāduccaiścopāṃśu ca kṣatrāyācakṣate 11.2.7.[16]
analyzed: kurvanti eke na eke tasmāt uccais ca upāṃśu ca kṣatrāya ācakṣate

original: viduttaraḥ puroḍāśaḥ sa yo ha vai viduttaraḥ puroḍāśa iti vedāva ha viśaṃ
analyzed: vid uttaraḥ puroḍāśaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai vid uttaraḥ puroḍāśaḥ iti veda ava ha viśam

original: runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca viśā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati tadyadāgneyaśca puroḍāśa
analyzed: runddha ithaḥ yat kim ca viśā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati tat yat āgneyaḥ ca puroḍāśa

original: upāṃśuyājaśca pūrvau bhavatastasmādubhe brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca viśi pratiṣṭhite 11.2.7.[17]
analyzed: upāṃśuyājaḥ ca pūrvau bhavataḥ tasmāt ubhe brahma ca kṣatram ca viśi pratiṣṭhite

original: rāṣṭraṃ sāṃnāyyaṃ sa yo ha vai rāṣṭraṃ sāṃnāyyamiti vedāva ha rāṣṭraṃ
analyzed: rāṣṭram sāṃnāyyam sa yaḥ ha vai rāṣṭram sāṃnāyyam iti veda ava ha rāṣṭram

original: runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca rāṣṭreṇa ja yyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati tadyatsaṃnayantyeke
analyzed: runddhethaḥ yat kim ca rāṣṭreṇa ja yyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati tat yat saṃnayanti eke

original: naike tasmādrāṣṭraṃ saṃ caiti vi ca 11.2.7.[18]
analyzed: na eke tasmāt rāṣṭram sam ca eti vi ca

original: tapaḥ sviṣṭakṛt sa yo ha vai tapaḥ sviṣṭakṛditi vedāva ha tapo runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca
analyzed: tapaḥ sviṣṭakṛt sa yaḥ ha vai tapaḥ sviṣṭakṛt iti veda ava ha tapaḥ runddhethaḥ yat kim ca

original: tapasā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[19]
analyzed: tapasā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

original: lokaḥ prāśitraṃ sa yo ha vai lokaḥ prāśitramiti vedāva ha lokaṃ runddhe'tho yatkiṃ
analyzed: lokaḥ prāśitram sa yaḥ ha vai lokaḥ prāśitram iti veda ava ha lokam runddhethaḥ yat kim

original: ca lokena jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati no ha lavena lokādvyathathe lavena ha vā
analyzed: ca lokena jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati na u ha lavena lokāt vyathathe lavena ha vā

original: amuṣmiṃloke lokādvyathante'tha ya evaṃ veda na ha bahu cana pāpaṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: amuṣmin loke lokāt vyathante tha yaḥ evam veda na ha bahu cana pāpam kṛtvā

original: lokādvyathate 11.2.7.[20]
analyzed: lokāt vyathate

original: śraddheḍā sa yo ha vai śraddheḍeti vedāva ha śraddhāṃ runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca
analyzed: śraddhā iḍā sa yaḥ ha vai śraddhā iḍā iti veda ava ha śraddhām runddhethaḥ yat kim ca

original: śraddhayā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[21]
analyzed: śraddhayā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

original: aśanireva prathamo'nuyājaḥ hrādunirdvitīya ulkuṣī tṛtīyaḥ 11.2.7.[22]
analyzed: aśaniḥ eva prathamaḥ anuyājaḥ hrāduniḥ dvitīyaḥ ulkuṣī tṛtīyaḥ

original: sa prathamamanuyājamanumantrayeta aśanyamuṃ jahīti yaṃ
analyzed: sa prathamam anuyājam anumantrayeta aśani amum jahi iti yam

original: dviṣyāddhrādunyamuṃ jahīti dvitīyamulkuṣyamuṃ jahīti tṛtīyam 11.2.7.[23]
analyzed: dviṣyāt hrāduni amum jahi iti dvitīyam ulkuṣi amum jahi iti tṛtīyam

original: sa ya eṣa kṣipram mriyate aśanirha tamanuyājo hantyatha yo visravanmiśra iva
analyzed: sa yaḥ eṣa kṣipram mriyate aśaniḥ ha tam anuyājaḥ hanti atha yaḥ visravat miśraḥ iva

original: hrādunirha tamanuyājo hantyatha yo'bhyuṣṭamiśra ivolkuṣī ha tamanuyājo hanti 11.2.7.[24]
analyzed: hrāduniḥ ha tam anuyājaḥ hanti atha yaḥ ubhyuṣṭa miśraḥ iva ulkuṣī ha tam anuyājaḥ hanti

original: saiṣā yajñameniḥ etayā vai menyā devā asurānparābhāvayāṃ cakrustatho
analyzed: sā eṣā yajña meniḥ etayā vai menyā devāḥ asurān parābhāvayām cakruḥ tathā

original: evaivaṃvidyajamānaḥ pāpmānaṃ dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam parābhāvayati 11.2.7.[25]
analyzed: eva evaṃvid yajamānaḥ pāpmānam dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam parābhāvayati

original: sa yadanuyājānto yajñaḥ syāt aśanyantaḥ syāddhrādunyanta utkuṣyantastasmādvai
analyzed: sa yat anuyāja antaḥ yajñaḥ syāt aśani antaḥ syāt hrādunyantaḥ utkuṣyantaḥ tasmāt vai

original: devānāṃ yajña iḍānto vaiva śamyvanto vā 11.2.7.[26]
analyzed: devānām yajñaḥ iḍā antaḥ vā eva śamyu antaḥ vā

original: prayājairvai devāḥ svargaṃ lokamāyaṃstānasurā anvājigāṃsaṃstānanuyājaiḥ
analyzed: prayājaiḥ vai devāḥ svargam lokam āyan tān asurāḥ anvājigāṃsan tān anuyājaiḥ

original: pratyauhaṃstadyadanuyājā ijyante pāpmānameva taddviṣantam bhrātṛvyaṃ
analyzed: pratyauhan tat yat anuyājāḥ ijyante pāpmānam eva tat dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam

original: yajamānaḥ pratyūhati 11.2.7.[27]
analyzed: yajamānaḥ pratyūhati

original: prāṇā vai prayājāḥ apānā anuyājāstasmātprayājāḥ prāñco hūyante taddhi
analyzed: prāṇāḥ vai prayājāḥ apānāḥ anuyājāḥ tasmāt prayājāḥ prāñcaḥ hūyante tat hi

original: prāṇarūpam
analyzed: prāṇa rūpam

original: pratyañco'nuyājāstadapānarūpametā ha vai darśapūrṇamāsayorupasado
analyzed: pratyañcaḥ unuyājāḥ tat apāna rūpam etāḥ ha vai darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upasadaḥ

original: yadanuyājāstasmātta upasadrūpeṇa pratyañco hūyante 11.2.7.[28]
analyzed: yat anuyājāḥ tasmāt te upasad rūpeṇa pratyañcaḥ hūyante

original: saṃsthā sūktavākaḥ sa yo ha vai saṃsthā sūktavāka iti vedāva ha saṃsthāṃ runddhe'tho
analyzed: saṃsthā sūktavākaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai saṃsthā sūktavākaḥ iti veda ava ha saṃsthām runddhethaḥ

original: yatkiṃ ca saṃsthayā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati gacati vayasaḥ saṃsthām 11.2.7.[29]
analyzed: yat kim ca saṃsthayā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati gacati vayasaḥ saṃsthām

original: pratiṣṭhā śamyorvākaḥ sa yo ha vai pratiṣṭhā śamyorvāk iti vedāva ha pratiṣṭhāṃ
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā śamyorvākaḥ sa yaḥ ha vai pratiṣṭhā śamyorvāc iti veda ava ha pratiṣṭhām

original: runddhe'tho yatkiṃ ca pratiṣṭhayā jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati gacati pratiṣṭhām 11.2.7.[30]
analyzed: runddhethaḥ yat kim ca pratiṣṭhayā jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati gacati pratiṣṭhām

original: te devāḥ etānpatnīsaṃyājānpaścātparyauhanta mithunamevaitadupariṣṭādadadhata
analyzed: te devāḥ etān patnīsaṃyājān paścāt paryauhanta mithunam eva etat upariṣṭāt adadhata

original: prajātyai tadyatpatnīsaṃyājā ijyante mithunamevaitadupariṣṭāddhatte prajātyai
analyzed: prajātyai tat yat patnīsaṃyājāḥ ijyante mithunam eva etat upariṣṭāt dhatte prajātyai

original: devānāṃ ha vai prajātimanu prajāyate mithunena-mithunena ha prajāyate ya
analyzed: devānām ha vai prajātim anu prajāyate mithunena mithunena ha prajāyate yaḥ

original: evametadveda 11.2.7.[31]
analyzed: evam etat veda

original: annaṃ samiṣṭayajuḥ sa yo ha vā annaṃ samiṣṭayajuriti vedāva hānnaṃ runddhe'tho
analyzed: annam samiṣṭa yajuḥ sa yaḥ ha vai annam samiṣṭa yajuḥ iti veda ava ha annam runddhethaḥ

original: yatkiṃ cānnena jayyaṃ sarvaṃ haiva tajjayati 11.2.7.[32]
analyzed: yat kim ca annena jayyam sarvam ha eva tat jayati

original: saṃvatsaro yajamānaḥ tamṛtavo yājayanti vasanta āgnīdhrastasmādvasante
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ yajamānaḥ tam ṛtavaḥ yājayanti vasantaḥ āgnīdhraḥ tasmāt vasante

original: dāvāścaranti taddhyagnirūpaṃ grīṣmo'dhvaryustapta iva vai
analyzed: dāvāḥ caranti tat hi agni rūpam grīṣmaḥ dhvaryuḥ taptaḥ iva vai

original: grīṣmastaptamivādhvaryurniṣkrāmati varṣā udgātā tasmādyadā balavadvarṣati
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ taptam iva adhvaryuḥ niṣkrāmati varṣāḥ udgātā tasmāt yadā balavat varṣati

original: sāmna ivopabdiḥ kriyate śaradbrahmā tasmādyadā sasyam pacyate brahmaṇvatyaḥ
analyzed: sāmnaḥ iva upabdiḥ kriyate śarad brahmā tasmāt yadā sasyam pacyate brahmaṇvatyaḥ

original: prajā ityāhurhemanto hotā tasmāddhemanvaṣaṭkṛtāḥ paśavaḥ sīdantyetā ha vā enaṃ
analyzed: prajāḥ iti āhuḥ hemantaḥ hotā tasmāt heman vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ paśavaḥ sīdanti etāḥ ha vai enam

original: devatā yājayanti sa yadyenamaiṣāvīrā yājayeyuretā eva devatā manasā dhyāyedetā
analyzed: devatāḥ yājayanti sa yadi enam aiṣāvīrāḥ yājayeyuḥ etāḥ eva devatāḥ manasā dhyāyet etāḥ

original: haivainaṃ devatā yājayanti 11.2.7.[33]
analyzed: ha eva enam devatāḥ yājayanti

original: atha haiṣaiva tulā yaddakṣiṇo vedyantaḥ sa yatsādhu karoti tadantarvedyatha
analyzed: atha ha eṣā eva tulā yat dakṣiṇaḥ vedi antaḥ sa yat sādhu karoti tat antarvedi atha

original: yadasādhu tadbahirvedi tasmāddakṣiṇaṃ vedyantamadhispṛśyevāsīta tulāyāṃ ha vā
analyzed: yat asādhu tat bahirvedi tasmāt dakṣiṇam vedi antam adhispṛśya iva āsīta tulāyām ha vā

original: amuṣmiṃloka ādadhati yataradyaṃsyati tadanveṣyati yadi sādhu vāsādhu vetyatha ya
analyzed: amuṣmin loke ādadhati yatarad yaṃsyati tat anveṣyati yadi sādhu vā asādhu vā iti atha yaḥ

original: evaṃ vedāsminhaivaloke tulāmārohatyatyamuṣmiṃloke tulādhānam mucyate
analyzed: evam veda asmin ha eva loke tulām ārohati ati amuṣmin loke tulādhānam mucyate

original: sādhukṛtyā haivāsya yacati na pāpakṛtyā 11.3.1.[1]
analyzed: sādhu kṛtyāḥ ha eva asya yacati na pāpa kṛtyāḥ

original: vāggha vā etasyāgnihotrasyāgnihotrī mana eva vatsastadidam manaśca vākca
analyzed: vāc ha vai etasya agnihotrasya agnihotrī manaḥ eva vatsaḥ tat idam manaḥ ca vāc ca

original: samānameva sannāneva tasmātsamānyā rajjvā vatsaṃ ca mātaraṃ cābhidadhati teja
analyzed: samānam eva sat nānā iva tasmāt samānyā rajjvā vatsam ca mātaram ca abhidadhati

original: eva śraddhā satyamājyam 11.3.1.[2]
analyzed: eva śraddhā satyam ājyam

original: taddhaitajjanako vaidehaḥ yājñavalkyam papraca vetthāgnihotraṃ yājñavalkyā3 iti
analyzed: tat ha etat janakaḥ vaidehaḥ yājñavalkyam papraca vettha agnihotram yājñavalkyaiḥ iti

original: veda samrāḍiti kimiti paya eveti 11.3.1.[3]
analyzed: veda samrāj iti kim iti payaḥ eva iti

original: yatpayo na syāt kena juhuyā iti vrīhiyavābhyāmiti yadvrīhiyavau na syātāṃ kena
analyzed: yat payaḥ na syāt kena juhuyāḥ iti vrīhi yavābhyām iti yat vrīhi yavau na syātām kena

original: juhuyā iti yā anyā oṣadhaya iti yadanyā oṣadhayo na syuḥ kena juhuyā iti yā āraṇyā
analyzed: juhuyāḥ iti yāḥ anyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti yat anyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ na syuḥ kena juhuyāḥ iti yā āraṇyā

original: oṣadhtyeneti yadvānaspatyaṃ na syātkena juhuyā ityadbhiriti yadāpo na syuḥ kena
analyzed: oṣadhtyena iti yat vānaspatyam na syāt kena juhuyāḥ iti adbhiḥ iti yadā āpaḥ na syuḥ kena

original: juhuyā iti 11.3.1.[4]
analyzed: juhuyāḥ iti

original: sa hovāca na vā iha tarhi kiṃ canāsīdathaitadahūyataiva satyaṃ śraddhāyāmiti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca na vai iha tarhi kim cana āsīt atha etat ahūyata eva satyam śraddhāyām iti

original: vetthāgnihotraṃ yājñavalkya dhenuśataṃ dadāmīti hovāca 11.3.1.[5]
analyzed: vettha agnihotram yājñavalkya dhenu śatam dadāmi iti ha uvāca

original: tadapyete ślokāḥ kiṃ svidvidvānpravasatyagnihotrī gṛhebhyaḥ kathaṃ svidasya
analyzed: tat api ete ślokāḥ kim svid vidvān pravasati agnihotrī gṛhebhyaḥ katham svid asya

original: kāvyaṃ kathaṃ saṃtato agnibhiriti kathaṃ svidasyānapaproṣitam bhavatītyevaitadāha 11.3.1.[6]
analyzed: kāvyam katham saṃtataḥ agnibhiḥ iti katham svid asya an apaproṣitam bhavati iti eva etat āha

original: yo javiṣṭho bhuvaneṣu sa vidvānpravasanvide tathā tadasya kāvyaṃ tathā saṃtato
analyzed: yaḥ javiṣṭhaḥ bhuvaneṣu sa vidvān pravasan vide tathā tat asya kāvyam tathā saṃtataḥ

original: agnibhiriti mana evaitadāha manasaivāsyānapaproṣitam bhavatīti 11.3.1.[7]
analyzed: agnibhiḥ iti manaḥ eva etat āha manasā eva asya an apaproṣitam bhavati iti

original: yatsa dūram paretya atha tatra pramādyati kasmintsāsya hutāhutirgṛhe yāmasya
analyzed: yat sa dūram paretya atha tatra pramādyati kasmin sā asya hutā āhutiḥ gṛhe yāmasya

original: juhvatīti yatsa dūram paretyātha tatra pramādyati kasminnasya sāhutirhutā
analyzed: juhvati iti yat sa dūram paretya atha tatra pramādyati kasmin asya sā āhutiḥ hutā

original: bhavatītyevaitadāha 11.3.1.[8]
analyzed: bhavati iti eva etat āha

original: yo jāgāra bhuvaneṣu viśvā jātāni yo'bibhaḥ tasmintsāsya hutāhutirgṛhe yāmasya
analyzed: yaḥ jāgāra bhuvaneṣu viśvā jātāni yaḥ bibhar tasmin sā asya hutā āhutiḥ gṛhe yāmasya

original: juhvatīti prāṇamevaitadāha tasmādāhuḥ prāṇa evāgnihotramiti 11.3.2.[1]
analyzed: juhvati iti prāṇam eva etat āha tasmāt āhuḥ prāṇaḥ eva agnihotram iti

original: yo ha vā agnihotre ṣaṇmithunāni veda mithunena-mithunena ha prajāyate sarvābhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ha vai agnihotre ṣaḍ mithunāni veda mithunena mithunena ha prajāyate sarvābhiḥ

original: prajātibhiryajamānaśca patnī ca tadekam mithunaṃ tasmādasya patnīvadagnihotraṃ
analyzed: prajātibhiḥ yajamānaḥ ca patnī ca tat ekam mithunam tasmāt asya patnīvat agnihotram

original: syādetanmithunamupāpnavānīti vatsaścāgnihotrī ca tadekam mithunaṃ tasmādasya
analyzed: syāt etat mithunam upāpnavāni iti vatsaḥ ca agnihotrī ca tat ekam mithunam tasmāt asya

original: puṃvatsāgnihotrī syādetanmithunamupāpnavānīti sthālī cāṅgārāśca tadekam
analyzed: puṃvat sā agnihotrī syāt etat mithunam upāpnavāni iti sthālī ca aṅgārāḥ ca tat ekam

original: mithunaṃ srukca sruvaśca tadekam mithunamāhavanīyaśca samicca tadekam
analyzed: mithunam sruc ca sruvaḥ ca tat ekam mithunam āhavanīyaḥ ca samidh ca tat ekam

original: mithunamāhutiśca svāhākāraśca tadekam mithunametāni ha vā agnihotre
analyzed: mithunam āhutiḥ ca svāhākāraḥ ca tat ekam mithunam etāni ha vai agnihotre

original: ṣaṇmithunāni tāni ya evaṃ veda mithunena-mithunena ha prajāyate sarvābhiḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣ mithunāni tāni yaḥ evam veda mithunena mithunena ha prajāyate sarvābhiḥ

original: prajātibhiḥ 11.3.3.[1]
analyzed: prajātibhiḥ

original: brahma vai mṛtyave prajāḥ prāyacat tasmai brahmacāriṇameva na
analyzed: brahma vai mṛtyave prajāḥ prāyacat tasmai brahmacāriṇam eva na

original: prāyacatso'bravīdastu mahyamapyetasminbhāga iti yāmeva rātriṃ samidhaṃ nāharātā
analyzed: prāyacat saḥ u bravīt astu mahyam api etasmin bhāge iti yām eva rātrim samidham na āharātā

original: iti tasmādyāṃ rātrim brahmacārī samidhaṃ nāharatyāyuṣa eva tāmavadāya vasati
analyzed: iti tasmāt yām rātrim brahmacārī samidham na āharati āyuṣe eva tām avadāya vasati

original: tasmādbrahmacārī samidhamāharennedāyuṣo'vadāya vasānīti 11.3.3.[2]
analyzed: tasmāt brahmacārī samidham āharet na id āyuṣaḥ vadāya vasāni iti

original: dīrghasattraṃ vā eṣa upaiti yo brahmacaryamupaiti sa
analyzed: dīrghasattram vai eṣaḥ upaiti yaḥ brahmacaryam upaiti sa

original: yāmupayantsamidhamādadhāti sā prāyaṇīyā yāṃ snāsyantsodayanīyātha yā antareṇa
analyzed: yām upayan samidham ādadhāti sā prāyaṇīyā yām snāsyan sā udayanīyā atha yāḥ antareṇa

original: sattryā evāsya tā brāhmaṇo brahmacaryamupayan 11.3.3.[3]
analyzed: sattryāḥ eva asya tāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ brahmacaryam upayan

original: caturdhā bhūtāni praviśati agnim padā mṛtyum padācāryam padātmanyevāsya
analyzed: caturdhā bhūtāni praviśati agnim padā mṛtyum padā ācāryam padā ātmani eva asya

original: caturthaḥ pādaḥ pariśiṣyate 11.3.3.[4]
analyzed: caturthaḥ pādaḥ pariśiṣyate

original: sa yadagnaye samidhamāharati ya evāsyāgnau pādastameva tena parikrīṇāti taṃ
analyzed: sa yat agnaye samidham āharati yaḥ eva asya agnau pādaḥ tam eva tena parikrīṇāti tam

original: saṃskṛtyātmandhatte sa enamā/viśati 11.3.3.[5]
analyzed: saṃskṛtya ātman dhatte saḥ enam āviśati

original: atha yadātmānaṃ daridrīkṛtyeva ahrīrbhūtvā bhikṣate ya evāsya mṛtyau
analyzed: atha yat ātmānam daridrīkṛtya iva ahrīḥ bhūtvā bhikṣate yaḥ eva asya mṛtyau

original: pādastameva tena parikrīṇāti taṃ saṃskṛtyātmandhatte sa enamāviśati 11.3.3.[6]
analyzed: pādaḥ tam eva tena parikrīṇāti tam saṃskṛtya ātman dhatte saḥ enam āviśati

original: atha yadācāryavacasaṃ karoti yadācāryāya karma karoti ya evāsyācārye pādastameva
analyzed: atha yat ācārya vacasam karoti yat ācāryāya karma karoti yaḥ eva asya ācārye pādaḥ tam eva

original: tena parikrīṇāti taṃ saṃskṛtyānmandhatte sa enamāviśati 11.3.3.[7]
analyzed: tena parikrīṇāti tam saṃskṛtya anmandhatte saḥ enam āviśati

original: so'dbhirbrahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipa 11.4.4.[5]
analyzed: sa udbhiḥ brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipa

original: atha ya uparaktena haviṣā yajate candramasā ha sa brahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipadyate
analyzed: atha yaḥ uparaktena haviṣā yajate candramasā ha sa brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipadyate

original: sa candramasā brahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipa 11.4.4.[6]
analyzed: sa candramasā brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipa

analyzed: atha yaḥ lohitena haviṣā yajate vidyutā ha sa brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipadyate sa

original: vidyutā brahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipa 11.4.4.[7]
analyzed: vidyutā brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipa

original: atha yaḥ suśṛtena haviṣā yajate ādityena ha sa brahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipadyate sa
analyzed: atha yaḥ su śṛtena haviṣā yajate ādityena ha sa brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipadyate sa

original: ādityena brahmaṇo dvāreṇa pratipadya brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati saiṣā
analyzed: ādityena brahmaṇaḥ dvāreṇa pratipadya brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyam salokatām jayati sā eṣā

original: haviṣaḥ samṛddhiḥ sa yo haivametāṃ haviṣaḥ samṛddhiṃ veda sarvasamṛddhena
analyzed: haviṣaḥ samṛddhiḥ sa yaḥ ha evam etām haviṣaḥ samṛddhim veda sarva samṛddhena

original: haivāsya haviṣeṣṭam bhavati 11.4.4.[8]
analyzed: ha eva asya haviṣā iṣṭam bhavati

original: athāto yajñasya samṛddhiḥ yadvai yajñasya nyūnam prajananamasya tadatha
analyzed: atha atas yajñasya samṛddhiḥ yat vai yajñasya nyūnam prajananam asya tat atha

original: yadatiriktam paśavyamasya tadatha yatsaṃkasukaṃ śriyā asya tadatha yatsampannaṃ
analyzed: yat atiriktam paśavyam asya tat atha yat saṃkasukam śriyāḥ asya tat atha yat sampannam

original: svargyamasya tat 11.4.4.[9]
analyzed: svargyamasya tat

analyzed: sa yadi manyeta nyūnam me yajñaḥ ebhūt iti prajananam me etat prajaniṣye iti eva

original: tadupāsīta 11.4.4.[10]
analyzed: tat upāsīta

original: atha yadi manyeta atiriktam me yajñe'bhūditi paśavyam ma
analyzed: atha yadi manyeta atiriktam me yajña ebhūt iti paśavyam ma

analyzed: etat paśumān bhaviṣyāmi iti eva tat upāsīta

analyzed: atha yadi manyeta saṃkasukam me yajñaḥ ebhūt iti śriyai me etadā mā śrīḥ tejasā yaśasā

original: brahmavarcasena parivṛtā gamiṣyatītyeva tadupāsīta 11.4.4.[12]
analyzed: brahmavarcasena parivṛtā gamiṣyati iti eva tat upāsīta

original: atha yadi manyeta sampannam me yajñe'bhūditi svargyam ma etatsvargaloko
analyzed: atha yadi manyeta sampannam me yajña ebhūt iti svargyam me etat svarga lokaḥ

original: bhaviṣyāmītyeva tadupāsīta saiṣā yajñasya samṛddhiḥ sa yo haivametāṃ yajñasya
analyzed: bhaviṣyāmi iti eva tat upāsīta sā eṣā yajñasya samṛddhiḥ sa yaḥ ha evam etām yajñasya

original: samṛddhiṃ veda sarvasamṛddhena haivāsya yajñeneṣṭam bhavati 11.5.1.[1]
analyzed: samṛddhim veda sarva samṛddhena ha eva asya yajñena iṣṭam bhavati

analyzed: urvaśī ha apsarāḥ purūravasam aiḍam cakame tam ha vindamānā uvāca tris sma mā ahnaḥ

original: vaitasena daṇḍena hatādakāmāṃ sma mā nipadyāsai mo sma tvā nagnaṃ darśameṣa
analyzed: vaitasena daṇḍena hatāt akāmām sma mā nipadyāsai mā u sma tvā nagnam darśameṣa

original: vai na strīṇāmupacāra iti 11.5.1.[2]
analyzed: vai na strīṇām upacāraḥ iti

original: sā hāsminyoguvāsa api hāsmādgarbhiṇyāsa tāvajjyogghāsminnuvāsa tato ha
analyzed: sā ha asmin yok uvāsa api ha asmāt garbhiṇī āsa tāvat jyok ha asmin uvāsa tatas ha

original: gandharvāḥ samūdire jyogvā iyamurvaśī manuṣyeṣvavātmīdupajānīta yatheyam
analyzed: gandharvāḥ samūdire jyok vai iyam urvaśī manuṣyeṣu avātmīt upajānīta yathā iyam

original: punarāgacediti tasyai hāvirdvyuraṇā śayana upabaddhāsa tato ha gandharvā
analyzed: punar āgacet iti tasyai ha āvis dvi uraṇā śayane upabaddhā āsa tatas ha gandharvā

original: anyataramuraṇam pramethuḥ 11.5.1.[3]
analyzed: anyataram uraṇam pramethuḥ

original: sā hovāca avīra iva bata me'jana iva putraṃ harantīti dvitīyam pramethuḥ sā ha
analyzed: sā ha uvāca avīraḥ iva bata mejanaḥ iva putram haranti iti dvitīyam pramethuḥ sā ha

original: tathaivovāca 11.5.1.[4]
analyzed: tathā eva uvāca

original: atha hāyamīkṣāṃ cakre kathaṃ nu tadavīraṃ kathamajanaṃ syādyatrāhaṃ syāmiti sa

original: nagna evānūtpapāta ciraṃ tanmene yadvāsaḥ paryadhāsyata tato ha gandharvā
analyzed: nagnaḥ eva anūtpapāta ciram tat mene yat vāsaḥ paryadhāsyata tatas ha gandharvā

original: vidyutaṃ janayāṃ cakrustaṃ yathā divaivaṃ nagnaṃ dadarśa tato haiveyaṃ tirobabhūva
analyzed: vidyutam janayām cakruḥ tam yathā divā evam nagnam dadarśa tatas ha eva iyam tirobabhūva

original: punaraimītyettirobhūtāṃ sa ādhyā jalpankurukṣetraṃ samayā cacārānyātaḥplakṣeti
analyzed: punar aimi iti et tirobhūtām saḥ ādhyā jalpan kurukṣetram samayā cacāra anyātaḥplakṣa iti

original: bisavatī tasyai hādhyantena vavrāja taddha tā apsarasa ātayo bhūtvā paripupluvire 11.5.1.[5]
analyzed: bisavatī tasyai ha adhyantena vavrāja tat ha tāḥ apsarasaḥ ātayaḥ bhūtvā paripupluvire

original: taṃ heyaṃ jñātvovāca ayaṃ vai sa manuṣyo yasminnahamavātsamiti tā hocustasmai
analyzed: tam ha iyam jñātvā uvāca ayam vai sa manuṣyaḥ yasmin aham avātsam iti tāḥ ha ūcuḥ tasmai

original: vā āvirasāmeti tatheti tasmai hāvirāsuḥ 11.5.1.[6]
analyzed: vai āvirasāma iti tathā iti tasmai ha āvirāsuḥ

original: tāṃ hāyaṃ jñātvābhiparovāda haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā
analyzed: tām ha ayam jñātvā abhiparovāda haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā

original: kṛṇavāvahai nu na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayaskaranparatare canāhannityupa nu
analyzed: kṛṇavāvahai nu na nau mantrāḥ anuditāsaḥ ete mayaskaran paratare cana ahan iti upa nu

original: rama saṃ nu vadāvahā iti haivaināṃ taduvāca 11.5.1.[7]
analyzed: rama sam nu vadāvahai iti ha eva enām tat uvāca

original: taṃ hetarā pratyuvāca kimetā vācā kṛṇavā tavāham prākramiṣamuṣasāmagriyeva
analyzed: tam ha itarā pratyuvāca kim etāḥ vācā kṛṇavā tava aham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyā iva

original: purūravaḥ punarastam parehi durāpanā vāta ivāhamasmīti na vai tvaṃ
analyzed: purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vātaḥ iva aham asmi iti na vai tvam

original: tadakaroryadahamabravaṃ durāpā vā ahaṃ tvayaitarhyasmi punargṛhānihīti
analyzed: tat akaroḥ yat aham abravam durāpā vai aham tvayā etarhi asmi punar gṛhān ihi iti

original: haivainaṃ taduvāca 11.5.1.[8]
analyzed: ha eva enam tat uvāca

original: atha hāyam paridyūna uvāca sudevo adya prapatedanāvṛtparāvatam paramām
analyzed: atha ha ayam paridyūnaḥ uvāca sudevaḥ adya prapatet anāvṛt parāvatam paramām

original: gantavāu adhā śayīta nirṛterupasthe'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāso adyuriti sudevo'dyodvā
analyzed: gantavau adhā śayīta nirṛteḥ upasthe idha enam vṛkāḥ rabhasāsaḥ adyuḥ iti su deva udya udvā

original: badhnīta pra vā patettadenaṃ vṛkā vā śvāno vādyuriti haiva taduvāca 11.5.1.[9]
analyzed: badhnīta pra vā patet tat enam vṛkāḥ vā śvānaḥ vā adyuḥ iti ha eva tat uvāca

original: taṃ hetarā pratyuvāca purūravo mā mṛthā mā prapapto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa u
analyzed: tam ha itarā pratyuvāca purūravaḥ mā mṛthāḥ mā prapaptaḥ mā tvā vṛkāsaḥ aśivāsaḥ u

original: kṣan na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayānyeteti maitadādṛthā na vai
analyzed: na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇām hṛdayāni eta iti mā etat ādṛthāḥ na vai

analyzed: straiṇam sakhyam asti punar gṛhān ihi iti ha eva enam tat uvāca

analyzed: yat virūpā acaram martyeṣu avasam rātrīḥ śaradaḥ catasraḥ ghṛtasya stokam sakṛt ahnu

analyzed: āśnām tādeva idam tātṛpāṇā carāmi iti tat etat ukta pratyuktam pañcadaśa ṛcam bahvṛcāḥ

original: prāhustasyai ha hṛdayamāvyayāṃ cakāra 11.5.1.[11]
analyzed: prāhuḥ tasyai ha hṛdayam āvyayām cakāra

original: punargandharvāneyāya 11.5.1.[14]
analyzed: punar gandharva āneyāya

analyzed: samidhaḥ ghṛtena anvajya samidvatībhiḥ ghṛtavatībhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhyādhattāt sa

analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ parokṣam iva vai etat āśvatthīm eva uttarāraṇim kuruṣva āśvatthīm adharāraṇim

analyzed: sa yaḥ tatas agniḥ janitā saḥ eva sa bhavitā iti

original: tasmāttadaniruktam 11.5.2.[4]

original: mukhamevāsyānīkavatīṣṭiḥ mukhaṃ hi prāṇānāmanīkamuraḥ sāṃtapanīyorasā hi

original: ayamevottara ūrurmahāhaviḥ tasya yāni pañca havīṃṣi samāyīni tā imāḥ
analyzed: ayam eva uttaraḥ ūruḥ mahāhaviḥ tasya yāni pañca havīṃṣi samāyīni tāḥ imāḥ

original: pañcāṅgulayaḥ kulphāvevaindrāgnaṃ havistadvai dvidevatyam bhavati tasmādimau
analyzed: pañca aṅgulayaḥ kulphau eva aindrāgnam haviḥ tat vai dvi devatyam bhavati tasmāt imau

original: dvau kulphāvidam māhendramidaṃ vaiśvakarmaṇaṃ tadvā aniruktam bhavati
analyzed: dvau kulphau idam māhendram idam vaiśvakarmaṇam tat vai aniruktam bhavati

original: tasmāttadaniruktamatha yadidamantarudare tatpitṛyajñastadvā aniruktam bhavati
analyzed: tasmāt tat aniruktam atha yat idam antar udare tat pitṛyajñaḥ tat vai aniruktam bhavati

original: tasmāttadaniruktam 11.5.2.[6]
analyzed: tasmāt tat aniruktam

original: ayamevottaro bāhuḥ śunāsīrīyam tasya yāni pañca havīṃṣi samāyīni tā imāḥ
analyzed: ayam eva uttaraḥ bāhuḥ śunāsīrīyam tasya yāni pañca havīṃṣi samāyīni tāḥ imāḥ

original: pañcāṅgulayo'tha ya eṣa upariṣṭāddhastasya saṃdhistacunāsīrīyamidaṃ vāyavyaṃ doḥ

original: varṣiṣṭhābhyāṃ devatābhyām paridadāti tathā hāsya brahmacārī na kāṃ
analyzed: varṣiṣṭhābhyām devatābhyām paridadāti tathā ha asya brahmacārī na kām

original: canārtimārcati na sa ya evaṃ veda 11.5.4.[4]
analyzed: cana ārtim ārcati na sa yaḥ evam veda

original: adbhyastvauṣadhībhyaḥ paridadāmīti tadenamadbhyaścauṣadhibhyaśca paridadāti
analyzed: adbhyaḥ tvā oṣadhībhyaḥ paridadāmi iti tat enam adbhyaḥ ca oṣadhibhyaḥ ca paridadāti

original: dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ tvā paridadāmīti tadenamābhyāṃ dyāvāpṛthivībhyām paridadāti
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivībhyām tvā paridadāmi iti tat enam ābhyām dyāvāpṛthivībhyām paridadāti

original: yayoridaṃ sarvamadhi viśvebhyastvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmyariṣṭyā iti tadenaṃ
analyzed: yayoḥ idam sarvam adhi viśvebhyaḥ tvā bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāmi ariṣṭyai iti tat enam

original: sarvebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ paridadātyariṣṭyai tathā hāsya brahmacārī na kāṃ
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ paridadāti ariṣṭyai tathā ha asya brahmacārī na kām

original: canārtimārcati na sa ya evaṃ veda 11.5.4.[5]
analyzed: cana ārtim ārcati na sa yaḥ evam veda

original: brahmacāryasītyāha brahmaṇa evainaṃ tatparidadātyapo'śā netyamṛtaṃ vā
analyzed: brahmacārī asi iti āha brahmaṇe eva enam tat paridadāti apośāḥ na iti amṛtam vā

original: āpo'mṛtamaśānetyevainaṃ tadāha karma kurviti vīryaṃ vai karma vīryaṃ
analyzed: āpaḥ umṛtam aśāna iti eva enam tat āha karma kuru iti vīryam vai karma vīryam

original: kurvityevainaṃ tadāha samidhamādhehīti samintsvātmānaṃ tejasā
analyzed: kuru iti eva enam tat āha samidham ādhehi iti samintsva ātmānam tejasā

original: brahmavarcasenetyevainaṃ tadāha mā śuṣupthā iti mā mṛthā ityevainaṃ
analyzed: brahmavarcasena iti eva enam tat āha mā śuṣupthāḥ iti mā mṛthāḥ iti eva enam

original: tadāhāpo'śānetyamṛtaṃ vā āpo'mṛtamaśānetyevainaṃ tadāha tadenamubhayato'mṛtena
analyzed: tat āha apa uśāna iti amṛtam vai āpaḥ umṛtam aśāna iti eva enam tat āha tat enam ubhayatas mṛtena

original: parigṛhṇāti tathā hāsya brahmacārī na kāṃ canārtimārcati na sa ya evaṃ veda 11.5.4.[6]
analyzed: parigṛhṇāti tathā ha asya brahmacārī na kām cana ārtim ārcati na sa yaḥ evam veda

original: athāsmai sāvitrīmanvāha tāṃ ha smaitām purā saṃvatsare'nvāhuḥ saṃvatsarasammitā
analyzed: atha asmai sāvitrīm anvāha tām ha sma etām purā saṃvatsarenvā āhuḥ saṃvatsara sammitā

original: vai garbhāḥ prajāyante jāta evāsmiṃstadvācaṃ dadhma iti 11.5.4.[7]
analyzed: vai garbhāḥ prajāyante jāte eva asmin tat vācam dadhmaḥ iti

original: atha ṣaṭsu māseṣu ṣaḍvā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasammitā vai garbhāḥ
analyzed: atha ṣaṭsu māseṣu ṣaṭ vai ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsara sammitāḥ vai garbhāḥ

original: prajāyante jāta evāsmiṃstadvācaṃ dadhma iti 11.5.4.[8]
analyzed: prajāyante jāte eva asmin tat vācam dadhmaḥ iti

original: atha caturviṃśatyahe caturviṃśatirvai saṃvatsarasyārdhamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasammitā vai
analyzed: atha caturviṃśati ahe caturviṃśatiḥ vai saṃvatsarasya ardha māsāḥ saṃvatsara sammitāḥ vai

original: garbhāḥ prajāyante jāta evāsmiṃstadvācaṃ dadhma iti 11.5.4.[9]
analyzed: garbhāḥ prajāyante jāte eva asmin tat vācam dadhmaḥ iti

original: atha dvādaśāhe dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasam 11.5.4.[10]
analyzed: atha dvādaśa ahe dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasam

original: atha ṣaḍahe ṣadvā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasaṃ 11.5.4.[11]
analyzed: atha ṣaṣ ahe ṣaṣ vai ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasam

original: atha tryahe trayo vā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasaṃ 11.5.4.[12]
analyzed: atha tri ahe trayaḥ vai ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsarasam

original: tadapi ślokaṃ gāyanti ācāryo garbhī bhavati hastamādhāya dakṣiṇam tṛtīyasyāṃ sa
analyzed: tat api ślokam gāyanti ācāryaḥ garbhī bhavati hastam ādhāya dakṣiṇam tṛtīyasyām sa

original: jāyate sāvitryā saha brāhmaṇa iti sadyo ha tvāva brāhmaṇāyānubrūyādāgneyo vai
analyzed: jāyate sāvitryā saha brāhmaṇaḥ iti sadyas ha tvāva brāhmaṇāya anubrūyāt āgneyaḥ vai

original: brāhmaṇaḥ sadyo vā agnirjāyate tasmātsadya eva brāhmaṇāyānubrūyāt 11.5.4.[13]
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ sadyas vai agniḥ jāyate tasmāt sadyas eva brāhmaṇāya anubrūyāt

original: tāṃ haitāmeke sāvitrīmanuṣṭubhamanvāhurvāgvā anuṣṭuptadasminvācaṃ dadhma
analyzed: tām ha etām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ vāc vai anuṣṭubh tat asmin vācam dadhma

original: iti na tathā kuryādyo hainaṃ tatra brūyādā nvā ayamasya vācamadita mūko
analyzed: iti na tathā kuryāt yaḥ ha enam tatra brūyāt ā nvai ayam asya vācam adita mūkaḥ

original: bhaviṣyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāttasmādetāṃ gāyatrīmeva sāvitrīmanubrūyāt 11.5.4.[14]
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti īśvaraḥ ha tathā eva syāt tasmāt etām gāyatrīm eva sāvitrīm anubrūyāt

original: atha haike dakṣiṇataḥ tiṣṭhate vāsīnāya vānvāhurna tathā kuryādyo hainaṃ tatra
analyzed: atha ha eke dakṣiṇatas tiṣṭhate vā āsīnāya vā anvāhuḥ na tathā kuryāt yaḥ ha enam tatra

original: brūyādbulbaṃ nvā ayamimamajījanata bulbo bhaviṣyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva
analyzed: brūyāt bulbam nvai ayam imam ajījanata bulbaḥ bhaviṣyati iti īśvaraḥ ha tathā eva

original: syāttasmātpurastādeva pratīce samīkṣamāṇāyānubrūyāt 11.5.4.[15]
analyzed: syāt tasmāt purastāt eva pratīce samīkṣamāṇāya anubrūyāt

original: tāṃ vai paco'nvāha trayo vai prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno
analyzed: tām vai paca unvāha trayaḥ vai prāṇāḥ prāṇaḥ udānaḥ

original: vyānastānevāsmiṃstaddadhātyathārdharcaśo dvau vā imau prāṇau prāṇodānāveva
analyzed: vyānaḥ tān eva asmin tat dadhāti atha ardharcaśaḥ dvau vai imau prāṇau prāṇa udānau eva

original: prāṇodānāvevāsmiṃstaddadhātyatha kṛtsnāmeko vā ayam prāṇaḥ kṛtsna eva
analyzed: prāṇa udānau eva asmin tat dadhāti atha kṛtsnām ekaḥ vai ayam prāṇaḥ kṛtsnaḥ eva

original: prāṇamevāsmiṃstatkṛtsnaṃ dadhāti 11.5.4.[16]
analyzed: prāṇam eva asmin tat kṛtsnam dadhāti

original: tadāhuḥ na brahmaṇam brahmacaryamupanīya mithunaṃ caredgarbho vā eṣa
analyzed: tat āhuḥ na brahmaṇam brahmacaryam upanīya mithunam caret garbhaḥ vai eṣa

original: bhavati yo brahmacaryamupaiti nedimam brahmaṇaṃ viṣiktādretaso janayānīti 11.5.4.[17]
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ brahmacaryam upaiti na id imam brahmaṇam viṣiktāt retasaḥ janayāni iti

original: tadu vā āhuḥ kāmameva careddvayyo vā imāḥ prajā daivyaścaiva manuṣyaśca tā vā
analyzed: tat u vai āhuḥ kāmam eva caret dvayyaḥ vai imāḥ prajāḥ daivyaḥ ca eva manuṣyaḥ ca tāḥ vā

original: imā manuṣyaḥ prajāḥ prajananātprajāyante candāṃsi vai daivyaḥ prajāstāni mukhato
analyzed: imāḥ manuṣyaḥ prajāḥ prajananāt prajāyante candāṃsi vai daivyaḥ prajāḥ tāni mukhataḥ

original: janayate tata etaṃ janayate tasmādu kāmameva caret 11.5.4.[18]
analyzed: janayate tatas etam janayate tasmāt u kāmam eva caret

original: tadāhuḥ na brahmacārī sanmadhvaśnīyādoṣadhīnāṃ vā eṣa paramo raso yanmadhu
analyzed: tat āhuḥ na brahmacārī san madhu aśnīyāt oṣadhīnām vai eṣa paramaḥ rasaḥ yat madhu

original: nedannādyasyāntaṃ gacānītyatha ha smāha śvetaketurāruṇeyo brahmacārī
analyzed: na id annādyasya antam gacāni iti atha ha sma āha śvetaketuḥ āruṇeyaḥ brahmacārī

original: sanmadhvaśnaṃstrayyai vā etadvidyāyai śiṣṭaṃ yanmadhu sa tu raso
analyzed: sat madhu aśnan trayyai vai etat vidyāyai śiṣṭam yat madhu sa tu

original: yasyedṛkśiṣṭamiti yathā ha vā ṛcaṃ vā yajurvā sāma vābhivyāharettādṛktadya evaṃ
analyzed: yasya īdṛś śiṣṭam iti yathā ha vai ṛcam vā yajuḥ vā sāma vā abhivyāharet tādṛś tat yaḥ evam

original: vidvānbrahmacārī sanmadhvaśnāti tasmādu kāmamevāśnīyāt 11.5.5.[1]
analyzed: vidvān brahmacārī san madhu aśnāti tasmāt u kāmam eva aśnīyāt

original: devānvā ūrdhvāntsvargaṃ lokaṃ yataḥ asurāstamasāntaradadhuste hocurna vā
analyzed: devān vai ūrdhvān svargam lokam yataḥ asurāḥ tamasā antaradadhuḥ te ha ūcuḥ na vā

original: asyānyena sattrādapaghāto'sti hanta sattramāsāmahā iti 11.5.5.[2]
analyzed: asya anyena sattrāt apaghātaḥ asti hanta sattram āsāmahai iti

original: te śatāgniṣṭomaṃ sattramupeyuḥ te yāvadāsīnaḥ
analyzed: te śata agniṣṭomam sattram upeyuḥ te yāvat āsīnaḥ

original: parāpaśyettāvatastamo'pāghnataivameva śatokthyena
analyzed: parāpaśyet tāvataḥ tam opāghnata evam eva śata ukthyena

original: yāvattiṣṭhanparāpaśyettāvatastamo'pāghnata 11.5.5.[3]
analyzed: yāvat tiṣṭhan parāpaśyet tāvataḥ tam opāghnata

original: te hocuḥ apa vāva tamo hanmahe na tveva sarvamiva hanta prajāpatim pitaram
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ apa vāva tamaḥ hanmahe na tu eva sarvam iva hanta prajāpatim pitaram

original: pratyayāmeti te prajāpatim pitaram pratītyocurasurā vai no bhagava ūrdhvāntsvargaṃ
analyzed: pratyayāma iti te prajāpatim pitaram pratītya ūcuḥ asurāḥ vai naḥ bhagavaḥ ūrdhvān svargam

original: lokaṃ yatastamasāntaradadhuḥ 11.5.5.[4]
analyzed: lokam yatas tamasā antaradadhuḥ

original: te śatāgniṣṭomaṃ sattramupaima te yāvadāsīnaḥ
analyzed: te śata agniṣṭomam sattram upaima te yāvat āsīnaḥ

original: parāpaśyettāvatastamo'pāhanmahyevameva śatokthyena
analyzed: parāpaśyet tāvataḥ tam opāhanmahi evam eva śata ukthyena

original: yāvattiṣṭhanparāpaśyettāvatastamo'pāhanmahi pra no bhagavañcādhi
analyzed: yāvat tiṣṭhan parāpaśyet tāvataḥ tam opāhanmahi pra naḥ bhagavan ca adhi

original: yathāsurāṃstamo'pahatya sarvam pāpmānamapahatya svargaṃ lokam prajñāsyāma iti 11.5.5.[5]
analyzed: yathā asurān tamaḥ upahatya sarvam pāpmānam apahatya svargam lokam prajñāsyāmaḥ iti

original: sa hovāca asarvakratubhyāṃ vai yajñābhyāmaganta yadagniṣṭomena cokthyena ca
analyzed: sa ha uvāca a sarva kratubhyām vai yajñābhyām aganta yat agniṣṭomena ca ukthyena ca

original: śatātirātraṃ sattramupeta tenāsurāṃstamo'pahatya sarvam pāpmānamapahatya
analyzed: śatātirātram sattram upeta tena asurān tam upahatya sarvam pāpmānam apahatya

original: svargaṃ lokam prajñāsyatheti 11.5.5.[6]
analyzed: svargam lokam prajñāsyatha iti

original: te śatātirātraṃ sattramupeyuḥ tenāsurāṃstamo'pahatya sarvam pāpmānamapahatya
analyzed: te śatātirātram sattram upeyuḥ tena asurān tam upahatya sarvam pāpmānam apahatya

original: svargaṃ lokam prajajñusteṣāmarvākpañcāśeṣvevāhaḥsvaharabhi rātrisāmāni parīyū
analyzed: svargam lokam prajajñuḥ teṣām arvāk pañcāśeṣu eva ahaḥsu ahar abhi rātri sāmāni parīyū

original: rātrimabhyahaḥsāmāni 11.5.5.[7]
analyzed: rātrim abhi ahar sāmāni

original: te hocuḥ amuhāma vai na prajānīmo hanta prajāpatimeva pitaram pratyayāmeti te
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ amuhāma vai na prajānīmaḥ hanta prajāpatim eva pitaram pratyayāma iti te

original: prajāpatimeva pitaram pratītyocurahanno rātrisāmāni rātryāmahno bhavanti naḥ
analyzed: prajāpatim eva pitaram pratītya ūcuḥ ahan naḥ rātrisāmāni rātryām ahnaḥ bhavanti naḥ

original: vipaścidyajñānmugdhānvidvāndhīro'nuśādhi na iti 11.5.5.[8]
analyzed: vipaścit yajñān mugdhān vidvān dhīraḥ anuśādhi naḥ iti

original: tānhaitadupajagau mahāhimiva vai hradādbalīyānanvavet]ya anutta
analyzed: tān ha etat upajagau mahā ahim iva vai hradāt balīyān anvavetya anutta

original: svādāsthānāttataḥ sattraṃ na tāyata iti 11.5.5.[9]
analyzed: svāt āsthānāt tatas sattram na tāyate iti

original: āśvinaṃ vai vaḥ śasyamānam prātaranuvākamāsthānādanutta yamāsthānādanuddhvaṃ
analyzed: āśvinam vai vaḥ śasyamānam prātaranuvākam āsthānāt anutta yam āsthānāt anuddhvam

original: dhīrāḥ santo adhīravat praśāstrā tamupeta śanairapratiśaṃsateti 11.5.5.[10]
analyzed: dhīrāḥ santaḥ a dhīra vat praśāstrā tam upeta śanais a pratiśaṃsata iti

original: te hocuḥ kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ śastaṃ kathamapratiśastamiti sa hovāca yatra
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ katham nu bhagavaḥ śastam katham a pratiśastam iti sa ha uvāca yatra

original: hotāśvinaṃ śaṃsannāgneyāsya kratorgāyatrasya candasaḥ pāraṃ gacāttatpratiprasthātā
analyzed: hotā āśvinam śaṃsan āgneya asya kratoḥ gāyatrasya candasaḥ pāram gacāt tat pratiprasthātā

original: vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya maitrāvaruṇasya havirdhānayoḥ
analyzed: vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya maitrāvaruṇasya havirdhānayoḥ

original: prātaranuvākamupākurutāduccairhotā śaṃsati śanairitaro jañjapyamāna ivānvāha
analyzed: prātaranuvākam upākurutāt uccais hotā śaṃsati śanais itaraḥ jañjapyamānaḥ iva anvāha

original: tanna vācā vācam pratyeti na candasā candaḥ 11.5.5.[11]
analyzed: tat na vācā vācam pratyeti na candasā candaḥ

original: parihite prātaranuvāke yathāyatanamevopāṃśvantaryāmau hutvā droṇakalaśe
analyzed: parihite prātaranuvāke yathāyatanam eva upāṃśu antaryāmau hutvā droṇakalaśe

original: pavitram prapīḍyaṃ nidadhāti tiro'hnayaiścaritvā pratyañcaḥ pratiparetya
analyzed: pavitram prapīḍyam nidadhāti tirohnayaiḥ caritvā pratyañcaḥ pratiparetya

original: tirohnayāneva bhakṣayādhvā athānupūrvaṃ yajñapucaṃ saṃsthāpya ya ūrdhvā
analyzed: tirohnayānā iva bhakṣayādhvai atha anupūrvam yajña pucam saṃsthāpya yaḥ ūrdhvā

original: antaryāmādgrahāstāngṛhītvā vipruṣāṃ homaṃ hutvā saṃtaniṃ ca bahiṣpavamānena
analyzed: antaryāmāt grahāḥ tān gṛhītvā vipruṣām homam hutvā saṃtanim ca bahiṣpavamānena

original: stutvāhareva pratipadyādhvā iti 11.5.5.[12]
analyzed: stutvā ahar eva pratipadyādhvai iti

original: tadete'bhi ślokāḥ caturbhiḥ saindhavairyuktairdhīrā vyajahustamaḥ vidvāṃso ye
analyzed: tat etebhiḥ ślokāḥ caturbhiḥ saindhavaiḥ yuktaiḥ dhīrāḥ vyajahuḥ tamaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ ye

original: śatakratu devāḥ sattramatanvateti 11.5.5.[13]
analyzed: śatakratu devāḥ sattram atanvata iti

original: catvāro hyatra yuktā bhavanti dvau hotārau dvāvadhvaryū pavernu śakveva hanūni
analyzed: catvāraḥ hi atra yuktāḥ bhavanti dvau hotārau dvau adhvaryū paveḥ nu śakvā iva hanūni

original: kalpayannahnorantau vyatiṣajanta dhīrāḥ na dānavā yajñiyaṃ tantumeṣāṃ vijānīmo
analyzed: kalpayan ahnoḥ antau vyatiṣajanta dhīrāḥ na dānavāḥ yajñiyam tantum eṣām vijānīmaḥ

original: vitatam mohayanti naḥ pūrvasyāhnaḥ pariṣiṃṣanti karma
analyzed: vitatam mohayanti naḥ pūrvasya ahnaḥ pariṣiṃṣanti karma

original: taduttareṇābhivitanvate'hnā durvijñānaṃ kāvyaṃ devatānāṃ somāḥ somairvyatiṣaktāḥ
analyzed: tat uttareṇa abhivitanvata ihnā durvijñānam kāvyam devatānām somāḥ somaiḥ vyatiṣaktāḥ

original: plavante samānāntsadamukṣanti hayānkāṣṭhabhṛto yathā pūrṇānparisrutaḥ
analyzed: plavante samānān sadam ukṣanti hayān kāṣṭhabhṛtaḥ yathā pūrṇān parisrutaḥ

original: kumbhānjanamejayasādana ityasurarakṣasānyapeyuḥ 11.5.6.[1]
analyzed: kumbhān janamejaya sādane iti asurarakṣasāni apeyuḥ

original: pañcaiva mahāyajñāḥ tānyeva mahāsattrāṇi bhūtayajño manuṣyayajñaḥ pitṛyajño
analyzed: pañca eva mahāyajñāḥ tāni eva mahā sattrāṇi bhūtayajñaḥ manuṣyayajñaḥ pitṛyajñaḥ

original: devayajño brahmayajña iti 11.5.6.[2]
analyzed: devayajñaḥ brahmayajñaḥ iti

original: aharaharbhūtebhyo baliṃ haret tathaitam bhūtayajñaṃ
analyzed: ahar ahar bhūtebhyaḥ balim haret tathā etam bhūtayajñam

original: samāpnotyaharahardadyādodapātrāttathaitam manuṣyayajñaṃ samāpnotyaharahaḥ
analyzed: samāpnoti ahar ahar dadyāt ā uda pātrāt tathā etam manuṣyayajñam samāpnoti ahar ahar

original: svadhākuryādodapātrāttathaitam pitṛyajñaṃ samāpnotyaharahaḥ svāhākuryādā
analyzed: svadhākuryāt ā uda pātrāt tathā etam pitṛyajñam samāpnoti ahar ahar svāhākuryāt ā

original: kāṣṭhāttathaitaṃ devayajñaṃ samāpnoti 11.5.6.[3]
analyzed: kāṣṭhāt tathā etam devayajñam samāpnoti

original: atha brahmayajñaḥ svādhyāyo vai brahmayajñastasya vā etasya brahmayajñasya
analyzed: atha brahmayajñaḥ svādhyāyaḥ vai brahmayajñaḥ tasya vai etasya brahmayajñasya

cakāra

original: te hocuḥ ati vai no'yaṃ rājanyabandhuravādīddhantainam brahmodyamāhvayāmahā
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ ati vai na uyam rājanyabandhuḥ avādīt hanta enam brahmodyam āhvayāmahai

original: iti sa hovāca yājñavalkyo brāhmaṇā vai vayaṃ smo rājanyabandhurasau yadyamuṃ
analyzed: iti sa ha uvāca yājñavalkyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vai vayam smaḥ rājanya bandhuḥ asau yadi amum

original: vayaṃ jayema kamajaiṣmeti brūyāmātha
analyzed: vayam jayema kam ajaiṣma iti brūyāma atha

original: yadyasāvasmānjayedbrāhmaṇānrājanyabandhurajaiṣīditi no
analyzed: yadi asau asmān jayet brāhmaṇān rājanyabandhuḥ ajaiṣīt iti no

original: brūyurmedamādṛḍhvamiti taddhāsya jajñuratha ha yājñavalkyo
analyzed: brūyuḥ mā idam ādṛḍhvam iti tat ha asya jajñuḥ atha ha yājñavalkyaḥ

original: rathamāstāyānupradhāvayāṃ cakāra taṃ hānvājagāma sa hovācāgnihotraṃ yājñavalkya
analyzed: ratham āstāya anupradhāvayāṃ cakāra tam ha anvājagāma sa ha uvāca agnihotram yājñavalkya

original: veditū3mityagnihotraṃ samrāḍiti 11.6.2.[6]
analyzed: samrāj iti

original: te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ te antarikṣamāviśataste antarikṣamevāhavanīyaṃ
analyzed: te vai ete āhutī hute utkrāmataḥ te antarikṣam āviśataḥ te antarikṣam eva āhavanīyam

original: kurvāte vāyuṃ samidham marīcīreva śukrāmāhutiṃ te antarikṣaṃ tarpayataste tata
analyzed: kurvāte vāyum samidham marīcīḥ eva śukrām āhutim te antarikṣam tarpayataḥ te tata

original: utkrāmataḥ 11.6.2.[7]
analyzed: utkrāmataḥ

original: te divamāviśataḥ te divamevāhavanīyaṃ kurvāte ādityaṃ samidhaṃ candramasameva
analyzed: te divam āviśataḥ te divam eva āhavanīyam kurvāte ādityam samidham candramasam eva

original: śukrāmāhutiṃ te divaṃ tarpayataste tata āvartete 11.6.2.[8]
analyzed: śukrām āhutim te divam tarpayataḥ te tatas āvartete

original: te imāmāviśataḥ te imāmevāhavanīyaṃ kurvāte agniṃ samidhamoṣadhīreva
analyzed: te imām āviśataḥ te imām eva āhavanīyam kurvāte agnim samidham oṣadhīḥ eva

original: śukrāmāhutiṃ te imāṃ tarpayataste tata utkrāmataḥ 11.6.2.[9]
analyzed: śukrām āhutim te imām tarpayataḥ te tatas utkrāmataḥ

original: te puruṣamāviśataḥ tasya mukhamevāhavanīyaṃ kurvāte jihvāṃ
analyzed: te puruṣam āviśataḥ tasya mukham eva āhavanīyam kurvāte jihvām

original: samidhamannameva śukrāmāhutiṃ te puruṣaṃ tarpayataḥ sa ya evaṃ
analyzed: samidham annam eva śukrām āhutim te puruṣam tarpayataḥ sa yaḥ evam

original: vidvānaśnātyagnihotramevāsya hutam bhavati te tata utkrāmataḥ 11.6.2.[10]
analyzed: vidvān aśnāti agnihotram eva asya hutam bhavati te tatas utkrāmataḥ

original: te striyamāviśataḥ tasyā upasthamevāhavanīyaṃ kurvāte dhārakāṃ samidhaṃ dhārakā
analyzed: te striyam āviśataḥ tasyāḥ upastham eva āhavanīyam kurvāte dhārakām samidham dhārakā

original: ha vai nāmaiṣaitayā ha vai prajāpatiḥ prajā dhārayāṃ cakāra reta eva śukrāmāhutiṃ
analyzed: ha vai nāma eṣā etayā ha vai prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ dhārayāṃ cakāra retaḥ eva śukrām āhutim

original: te striyaṃ tarpayataḥ sa ya evaṃ vidvānmithunamupaityagnihotramevāsya hutam
analyzed: te striyam tarpayataḥ sa yaḥ evam vidvān mithunam upaiti agnihotram eva asya hutam

original: bhavati yastataḥ putro jāyate sa lokaḥ pratyutthāyyetadagnihotraṃ yājñavalkya nātaḥ
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ tatas putraḥ jāyate sa lokaḥ pratyutthāyi etat agnihotram yājñavalkya na atas

original: paramastīti hovāca tasmai ha yājñavalkyo varaṃ dadau sa hovāca kāmapraśna eva me
analyzed: param asti iti ha uvāca tasmai ha yājñavalkyaḥ varam dadau sa ha uvāca kāma praśnaḥ eva me

original: tvayi yājñavalkyāsaditi tato brahmā janaka āsa 11.6.3.[1]
analyzed: tvayi yājñavalkya asat iti tatas brahmā janakaḥ āsa

original: janako ha vaideho bahudakṣiṇena yajñeneje sa ha gavāṃ
analyzed: janakaḥ ha vaidehaḥ bahu dakṣiṇena yajñena īje sa ha gavām

original: sahasramavarundhannuvācaitā vo brāhmaṇā yo brahmiṣṭhaḥ sa udajatāmiti 11.6.3.[2]
analyzed: sahasram avarundhan uvāca etāḥ vaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ yaḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ saḥ udajatām iti

original: sa hovāca yājñavalkyo 'rvācīretā iti te hocustvaṃ svinno yājñavalkya brahmiṣṭho'sī3
analyzed: sa ha uvāca yājñavalkyaḥ rvācī retāḥ iti te ha ūcuḥ tvam svinnaḥ yājñavalkya brahmiṣṭhā usī

original: iti sa hovāca namo'stu brahmiṣṭhāya gokāmā eva vayaṃ sma iti 11.6.3.[3]
analyzed: iti sa ha uvāca namaḥ astu brahmiṣṭhāya go kāmāḥ eva vayam smaḥ iti

original: te hocuḥ ko na imam prakṣyatīti sa hovāca vidagdhaḥ śākalyo'hamiti taṃ ha
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ kaḥ naḥ imam prakṣyati iti sa ha uvāca vidagdhaḥ śākalyaḥ aham iti tam ha

original: pratikhyāyovāca tvāṃ svicākalya brāhmaṇā ulmukāvakṣayaṇamakratā3iti 11.6.3.[4]
analyzed: pratikhyāya uvāca tvām svicākalya brāhmaṇā

original: sa hovāca kati devā yājñavalkyeti trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasretyomiti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca kati devāḥ yājñavalkya iti trayaḥ ca trī ca śatā trayaḥ ca trī ca sahasrā iti om iti

original: hovāca katyeva devā yājñavalkyeti trayastriṃśadityomiti hovāca katyeva devā
analyzed: ha uvāca kati eva devāḥ yājñavalkya iti trayastriṃśat iti om iti ha uvāca kati eva devāḥ

original: yājñavalkyeti traya ityomiti hovāca katyeva devā yājñavalkyeti dvāvityomiti hovāca
analyzed: yājñavalkya iti trayaḥ iti om iti ha uvāca kati eva devāḥ yājñavalkya iti dvau iti om iti ha uvāca

original: katyeva devā yājñavalkyetyadhyardha ityomiti hovāca katyeva devā yājñavalkyetyeka
analyzed: kati eva devāḥ yājñavalkya iti adhyardhe iti om iti ha uvāca kati eva devāḥ yājñavalkya iti eka

original: ityomiti hovāca katame te trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasreti 11.6.3.[5]
analyzed: iti om iti ha uvāca katame te trayaḥ ca trī ca śatā trayaḥ ca trī ca sahasrā iti

original: sa hovāca mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devā iti katame te
analyzed: sa ha uvāca mahimānaḥ eva eṣām ete trayastriṃśat tu eva devāḥ iti katame te

original: trayastriṃśadityaṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityāsta ekatriṃśadindraścaiva
analyzed: trayastriṃśat iti aṣṭau vasavaḥ ekādaśa rudrāḥ dvādaśa ādityāḥ te ekatriṃśat indraḥ ca eva

original: prajāpatiśca trayastrṃśāviti 11.6.3.[6]
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ ca trayastrṃśau iti

original: katame vasava iti agniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca
analyzed: katame vasavaḥ iti agniḥ ca pṛthivī ca vāyuḥ ca antarikṣam ca ādityaḥ ca dyauḥ ca

original: candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi caite vasava ete hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayante te yadidaṃ sarvaṃ
analyzed: candramāḥ ca nakṣatrāṇi ca ete vasavaḥ ete hi idam sarvam vāsayante te yat idam sarvam

original: vāsayante tasmādvasava iti 11.6.3.[7]
analyzed: vāsayante tasmāt vasavaḥ iti

original: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste
analyzed: katame rudrāḥ iti daśa ime puruṣe prāṇāḥ ātmā ekādaśaḥ te

original: yadāsmānmartyācarīrādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti tadyadrodayanti tasmādrudrā iti 11.6.3.[8]
analyzed: yadā asmāt martyāḥ carīrāt utkrāmanti atha rodayanti tat yat rodayanti tasmāt rudrāḥ iti

original: katama ādityā iti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsarasyaita ādityā ete hīdaṃ sarvamādadānā
analyzed: katame ādityāḥ iti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya ete ādityāḥ ete hi idam sarvam ādadānā

original: yanti te yadidaṃ sarvamādadānā yanti tasmādādityā iti 11.6.3.[9]
analyzed: yanti te yat idam sarvam ādadānāḥ yanti tasmāt ādityāḥ iti

original: katama indraḥ katamaḥ prajāpatiriti stanayitnurevendro yajñaḥ prajāpatiriti katama
analyzed: katamaḥ indraḥ katamaḥ prajāpatiḥ iti stanayitnuḥ eva indraḥ yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ iti katama

original: stanayitnurityaśaniriti katamo yajña iti paśava iti 11.6.3.[10]
analyzed: stanayitnuḥ iti aśaniḥ iti katamaḥ yajñaḥ iti paśavaḥ iti

original: katame te trayo devā iti ima eva trayo lokā eṣu hīme sarve devā iti katamau tau
analyzed: katame te trayaḥ devāḥ iti ime eva trayaḥ lokāḥ eṣu hi ime sarve devāḥ iti katamau tau

original: dvau devāvityannaṃ caiva prāṇaśceti katamo'dhyardha iti yo'yam pavata iti katama
analyzed: dvau devau iti annam ca eva prāṇaḥ ca iti katamaḥ adhyardhaḥ iti yaḥ uyam pavate iti katama

original: eko deva iti prāṇa iti 11.6.3.[11]
analyzed: ekaḥ devaḥ iti prāṇaḥ iti

original: sa hovāca anatipraśnyām mā devatāmatyaprākṣīḥ puretithyai mariṣyasi na te'sthīni
analyzed: sa ha uvāca anatipraśnyām mā devatām atyaprākṣīḥ purā itithyai mariṣyasi na testhīni

original: cana gṛhānprāpsyantīti sa ha tathaiva mamāra tasya hāpyanyanmanyamānāḥ
analyzed: cana gṛhān prāpsyanti iti sa ha tathā eva mamāra tasya ha api anyat manyamānāḥ

original: parimoṣiṇo'sthīnyapajahrustasmānnopavādī syāduta hyevaṃvitparo bhavati 11.7.1.[1]
analyzed: parimoṣiṇaḥ usthīni apajahruḥ tasmāt na upavādī syāt uta hi evaṃvid paraḥ bhavati

original: paśubandhena yajate paśavo vai paśubandhaḥ sa yatpaśubandhena yajate
analyzed: paśubandhena yajate paśavaḥ vai paśubandhaḥ sa yat paśubandhena yajate

original: paśumānasānīti tena gṛheṣu yajeta gṛheṣu paśūnbadhnā iti tena suyavase yajeta

analyzed: su yavase paśūn badhnai iti jīryanti ha vai juhvataḥ yajamānasya agnayā ugnīn jīryataḥ nu

original: yajamāno yajamānamanu gṛhāśca paśavaśca 11.7.1.[2]
analyzed: yajamānaḥ yajamānam anu gṛhāḥ ca paśavaḥ ca

original: sa yatpaśubandhena yajate agnīnevaitatpunarṇavānkurute'gnīnām punarṇavatāmanu

analyzed: yajamānam anu gṛhāḥ ca paśavaḥ ca āyuṣyaḥ ha vai asya eṣa ātma niṣkrayaṇaḥ bhavati

original: māṃsīyanti ha vai juhvato yajamānasyāgnayaste yajamānameva dhyāyanti yajamānaṃ
analyzed: māṃsīyanti ha vai juhvataḥ yajamānasya agnayaḥ te yajamānam eva dhyāyanti yajamānam

original: vidyate yasyo caite bhavanti 11.7.1.[3]
analyzed: vidyate yasya u ca ete bhavanti

analyzed: sa yat paśubandhena yajate ātmānam eva etat niṣkrīṇīte vīreṇa vīram vīraḥ hi

original: paśurvīro yajamāna etadu ha vai paramannādyaṃ yanmāṃsaṃ sa
analyzed: paśuḥ vīraḥ yajamānaḥ etat u ha vai param annādyam yat māṃsam sa

original: paramasyaivānnādyasyāttā bhavati taṃ vai saṃvatsaro nānījanamatīyādāyurvai
analyzed: paramasya eva annādyasya attā bhavati tam vai saṃvatsaraḥ na anījanam atīyāt āyuḥ vai

original: saṃvatsara āyurevaitadamṛtamātmandhatte 11.7.2.[1]
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ āyuḥ eva etat amṛtam ātman dhatte

original: haviryajñavidho ha vā anyaḥ paśubandhaḥ savavidho'nyaḥ sa haiṣa haviryajñavidho
analyzed: haviḥ yajña vidhaḥ ha vai anyaḥ paśubandhaḥ sava vidhaḥ nyaḥ sa ha eṣa haviḥ yajña vidhaḥ

original: yasminvratamupanayati yasminnapaḥ praṇayati yasminpūrṇapātraṃ ninayati
analyzed: yasmin vratam upanayati yasmin apaḥ praṇayati yasmin pūrṇapātram ninayati

original: yasminviṣṇukramānkramayatyatha haiṣa savavidho yasminnetāni na kriyante 11.7.2.[2]
analyzed: yasmin viṣṇukramān kramayati atha ha eṣa savavidhaḥ yasmin etāni na kriyante

original: tadāhuḥ iṣṭiḥ paśubandhā3 mahāyajñā3 iti mahāyajña iti ha brūyādiṣṭiṃ vai tarhi
analyzed: tat āhuḥ iṣṭiḥ paśubandhāḥ mahāyajñāḥ iti mahāyajñaḥ iti ha brūyāt iṣṭim vai tarhi

original: paśubandhamakarvyenamakṛkṣathā ityenam brūyāt 11.7.2.[3]
analyzed: paśubandham akarvī enam akṛkṣathāḥ iti enam brūyāt

original: tasya prayājā eva prātaḥsavanam anuyājāstṛtīyasavanam puroḍāśa eva mādhyandinaṃ
analyzed: tasya prayājāḥ eva prātaḥsavanam anuyājāḥ tṛtīyasavanam puroḍāśaḥ eva mādhyandinam

original: savanam 11.7.2.[4]
analyzed: savanam

original: taddhaike vapāyāṃ hutāyāṃ dakṣiṇā nayanti tadu tathā na kuryādyo hainaṃ tatra
analyzed: tat ha eke vapāyām hutāyām dakṣiṇāḥ nayanti tat u tathā na kuryāt yaḥ ha enam tatra

original: brūyādbahirdhā nvā ayam prāṇebhyo dakṣiṇā anaiṣīnna prāṇānadadakṣadandho vā
analyzed: brūyāt bahirdhā nvai ayam prāṇebhyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ anaiṣīt na prāṇān adadakṣat andhaḥ vā

original: srāmo vā badhiro vā pakṣahato vā bhaviṣyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāt 11.7.2.[5]
analyzed: srāmaḥ vā badhiraḥ vā pakṣa hataḥ vā bhaviṣyati iti īśvaraḥ ha tathā eva syāt

original: itthameva kuryāt puroḍāśeḍāyāmevopahūtāyāṃ dakṣiṇā nayedaindro vā ayam
analyzed: ittham eva kuryāt puroḍāśa iḍāyām eva upahūtāyām dakṣiṇāḥ nayet aindraḥ vai ayam

original: madhyataḥ prāṇa imamevaitadaindram madhyataḥ prāṇaṃ
analyzed: madhyatas prāṇaḥ imam eva etat aindram madhyatas prāṇam

original: dakṣiṇābhirdakṣayatyaindraṃ vai mādhyandinaṃ savanam mādhyandine vai savane
analyzed: dakṣiṇābhiḥ dakṣayati aindram vai mādhyandinam savanam mādhyandine vai savane

original: dakṣiṇā nīyante tasmātpuroḍāśeḍāyāmevopahūtāyāṃ dakṣiṇā nayet 11.7.2.[6]
analyzed: dakṣiṇāḥ nīyante tasmāt puroḍāśa iḍāyām eva upahūtāyām dakṣiṇāḥ nayet

original: tadāhuḥ adhvaryo yaddīkṣitasya nānavabhṛtho'vakalpate kvainamadidīkṣa
analyzed: tat āhuḥ adhvaryo yat dīkṣitasya na anavabhṛthā uvakalpate kva enam adidīkṣa

original: ityāvabhṛthādanūddṛṃheyuradhvaryuśca pratiprasthātā ca hotā ca maitrāvaruṇaśca
analyzed: iti ā avabhṛthāt anūddṛṃheyuḥ adhvaryuḥ ca pratiprasthātā ca hotā ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ ca

original: brahmā cāgnīdhraścaitairvā eṣa ṣaḍḍhotā tamanudrutya ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ
analyzed: brahmā ca agnīdhraḥ ca etaiḥ vai eṣa ṣaḍḍhotā tam anudrutya ṣaḍḍhotāram

original: juhotyekāmāhutiṃ kṛtvā pañca vājyā dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamātmāṅgairyajñam
analyzed: juhoti ekām āhutim kṛtvā pañca vājyāḥ dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam ātma aṅgaiḥ yajñam

original: pṛthivīṃ śarīraiḥ vācaspate'cidrayā vācācidrayā juhvā divi devāvṛdhaṃ
analyzed: pṛthivīm śarīraiḥ vācaspate cidrayā vācā acidrayā juhvā divi devāvṛdham

original: hotrāmairayatsvāheti saiva dīkṣā 11.7.2.[7]
analyzed: hotrām airayat svāhā iti sā eva dīkṣā

original: tadāhuḥ adhvaryo yaddīkṣitasya nānavabhṛtho'vakalpate
analyzed: tat āhuḥ adhvaryo yat dīkṣitasya na anavabhṛthā uvakalpate

original: kvainamavabhṛthamavaneṣyasīti sa yaddhṛdayaśūlena caranti sa haivaitasyāvabhṛthaḥ 11.7.2.[8]
analyzed: kva enam avabhṛtham avaneṣyasi iti sa yat hṛdayaśūlena caranti sa ha eva etasya avabhṛthaḥ

original: madhuko ha smāha paiṅgyaḥ visomena vā eke paśubandhena yajante sasomenaike
analyzed: madhukaḥ ha sma āha paiṅgyaḥ visomena vai eke paśubandhena yajante sa somena eke

original: divi vai soma āsīttaṃ gāyatrī vayo bhūtvāharattasya yatparṇamacidyata tatparṇasya
analyzed: divi vai somaḥ āsīt tam gāyatrī vayaḥ bhūtvā aharat tasya yat parṇam acidyata tat parṇasya

original: parṇatvamiti nvā etadbrāhmaṇamudyate visomena vā eke paśubandhena yajante
analyzed: parṇa tvam iti nvai etat brāhmaṇam udyate visomena vai eke paśubandhena yajante

original: sasomenaike sa haiṣa visomena paśubandhena yajate yo'nyam pālāśādyūpaṃ
analyzed: sa somena eke sa ha eṣa visomena paśubandhena yajate yonyam pālāśāt yūpam

original: kurute'tha haiṣa sasomena paśubandhena yajate yaḥ pālāśaṃ yūpaṃ kurute
analyzed: kuruta itha ha eṣa sa somena paśubandhena yajate yaḥ pālāśam yūpam kurute

original: tasmātpālāśameva yūpaṃ kurvīta 11.7.3.[1]

analyzed: sa ha uvāca āmantraṇīyān nu āmantrayai iti tān ha āmantrya uvāca yat yasmai

original: vakṣyāmyamuṣyaivedam prajā bhaviṣyati na mama lokī tvaham bhaviṣyāmi yadyu
analyzed: vakṣyāmi amuṣya eva idam prajā bhaviṣyati na mama lokī tu aham bhaviṣyāmi yadi u

original: vā asmai na vakṣyāmi mamaivedam prajā bhaviṣyati nāmuṣya lokī tvasau
analyzed: vai asmai na vakṣyāmi mama eva idam prajā bhaviṣyati na amuṣya lokī tu asau

original: bhaviṣyatīti te hocurmā bhagavo voco'yaṃ vāva kṣatriyasya loka iti sa hovāca
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti te ha ūcuḥ mā bhagavaḥ vocaḥ yam vāva kṣatriyasya lokaḥ iti sa ha uvāca

original: vakṣyāmyevāmūrvai rātrayo bhūyasya iti 11.8.4.[6]
analyzed: vakṣyāmi eva amūḥ vai rātrayaḥ bhūyasyaḥ iti

original: tasmā u haitaduvāca spṛtīrhutvānyāmājateti brūtātsā te samrāḍdughā syāditi
analyzed: tasmai u ha etat uvāca spṛtīḥ hutvā anyām ājata iti brūtāt sā te samrāḍdughā syāt iti

original: candrātte mana spṛṇomi svāhā sūryātte cakṣu spṛṇomi svāhā vātātte prāṇāntspṛṇomi
analyzed: candrāt te manaḥ spṛṇomi svāhā sūryāt te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi svāhā vātāt te prāṇān spṛṇomi

original: svāhā digbhyaste śrotraṃ spṛṇomi svāhādbhyaste lohitaṃ spṛṇomi svāhā pṛthivyai te
analyzed: svāhā digbhyaḥ te śrotram spṛṇomi svāhā adbhyaḥ te lohitam spṛṇomi svāhā pṛthivyai te

original: śarīraṃ spṛṇomi svāhetyathānyāmājateti brūtātsā te samrāḍdughā syāditi tato haiva sa
analyzed: śarīram spṛṇomi svāhā iti atha anyām ājata iti brūtāt sā te samrāḍdughā syāt iti tatas ha eva sa

original: utsasāda kaiśinīrevemā apyetarhi prajā jāyante
analyzed: utsasāda kaiśinīḥ eva imāḥ api etarhi prajāḥ jāyante
